News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
December 4 saw another statement by NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg made in Brussels that Russia should end its recognition of the independence of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Abkhazia and withdraw its forces “from these regions of Georgia”.
The consolidated position of NATO members regarding South Ossetia and Abkhazia is well known, and similar calls, accompanying traditional statements on support for Georgia in its aspiration to join NATO, have long ago turned into a necessary ritual.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Alan Elbakiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Republic of South Ossetia, on December 5, 2018.
During the meeting the parties summed up major developments in the South Ossetian-Abkhazian cooperation achieved in 2018, discussed the perspectives of further interaction between Foreign Ministries of the two states, including at the international arena, and exchanged opinion on range of issues of the bilateral agenda.

News_Titles: South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Answer to Media
News_Shorts:
Q:  Just several hours later after she was elected as the President of Georgia Mrs. Zurabishvili has stated that it’s not the time to speak with Russia and immediately reloaded the theme of Russian occupation. How can you comment on that?
A:  Definitely, these elections are an internal affair of Georgia and have nothing to do with our Republic. As for the question, hardly did anyone expect more “original” comment on that issue of her … In short time after the elections a noted signal has been sent to the Western partners as well as to Russia. On the other hand that signal is also good for internal use. And maybe this statement would ease the burden of expenses for the sponsors of the mega-budget project “democratic elections in Georgia” as well…

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the situation in Syria
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia strongly condemns another air strike carried by US-led coalition in Deir ez-Zor, which resulted in victims among civilians, and perceives these actions as an open act of aggression against a sovereign state.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
At the request of Ashot Astabatsyan, Head of the Representation of the International Committee of the Red Cross in the Republic of South Ossetia, a meeting with Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, was held on November 28, 2018.
During the meeting Mr. Astabatsyan reported on the humanitarian programs, implemented in South Ossetia in 2018, and told about the work of the Committee, planned for 2019. Head of the Representation expressed gratitude to the Ministry as the hosting party for the consistent constructive support to the Mission in territory of the Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Vitaliy Yankovskiy, the Head of the Official Representation of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, on November 24, 2018.
Mr. Yankovskiy reported about the work of the Representation on deepening and extending the bilateral cooperation conducted in accordance with the existing agreements. Consultations on a range of issues which could promote further acceleration of efforts for further development of friendly ties between South Ossetia and Pridnestrovie were held.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: November 20 saw a working meeting of the South Ossetian delegation at the GID, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, and the Co-Chairs of the Discussions representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia to South Ossetia International Information Agency
News_Shorts: The European Parliament has prepared a draft resolution, which, inter alia, urges the Georgian authorities to “try to extend the benefits of the AA [EU-Georgia Association Agreement] and the DCFTA [Deep and Comprehensive Free Trade Area] to the populations of Abkhazia and the Tskhinvali Region/South Ossetia”.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the working visit to Moscow Dmitrii Medoev attended new premises of the South Ossetian Embassy, which had been provided by the Russian party in accordance with the agreements, reached by Anatolii Bibilov and Vladimir Putin in November 2017 during the official visit of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Russian Federation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Opening ceremony of the Second Global Forum of Young Diplomats “Together to the Future”, organized by the Board of Young Diplomats under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, chaired by Konstantin Kolpakov, was held in Sochi on November 12.
Zarina Kochieva, First Secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and Aleksandra Tskhovrebova, Attaché of the Ministry, are representing the South Ossetian Foreign Ministry.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Sergey Lavrov, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, as well as bilateral South Ossetian-Russian consultations took place in the Reception House of the Russian Foreign Ministry at Spiridonovka Street on November 12.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On May 17 Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, participated in a solemn assembly, organized in the conference hall of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Abkhazia on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the establishment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.
Raul Khadzhimba, the President of the Republic of Abkhazia, Alexey Pavlovsky, the Director of Fourth CIS Department of the MFA of the Russian Federation, and Vitaly Ignatiev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, also participated in the event. 
The meeting was opened by Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, who welcomed the guests and told about the main directions of the foreign policy of the Republic. 
On behalf of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev congratulated the Abkhazian colleagues with the professional day and presented the Ministry with a painting named “The Lake of Ertso” by a famous Ossetian artist Georgii Gabaraev.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the appointment of the Head of the Official Representation of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of South Ossetia 
Under the Decree of Vadim Krasnoselskii, the President of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, dated November 8, 2018 and issued in accordance with the Treaty on Friendship, Cooperation and Partnership signed between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic on September 20, 2016 in order to promote further interaction between the two states Alan Pliev was appointed as Head of the Official Representation of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A working visit of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev to Moscow will take place on November 11-13.
Negotiations between the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev and the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation Sergey Lavrov as well as bilateral South Ossetia-Russia political consultations are expected to be held during the visit. 
Exchange of opinion on key agenda points of the bilateral relations is expected. Alongside with this the parties will discuss terms of strengthening the international positions of South Ossetia and interaction at the GID.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Ratification of the Treaty of Friendship and Cooperation between the Syrian Arab Republic and the Republic of South Ossetia was discussed at a regular session of the South Ossetian Parliament on November 2. The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev participated in the session as an official representative of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, hosted a meeting with Marat Kulakhmetov, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to the Republic of South Ossetia.
The parties exchanged opinion on running issues of the bilateral cooperation, discussed terms of further deepening of multi-faceted cooperation between foreign policy agencies of the states and observed the situation in the region.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
International Days of Self-determined Nations (Giornate Internazionali dell’Autodeterminzione dei Popoli), which were organized in Verona and in which participated Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, finished on October 28.
An address by members of the Presidium of the Congress in support of the Republic of South Ossetia followed the speech of the Minister.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon an invitation from Stato Veneto Political Movement the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev made a report at the International Days of Self-determined Nations (Giornate Internazionali dell’Autodeterminzione dei Popoli) held in Verona on October 26.
Important aspects of the South Ossetian nation building process, political and legal grounds for the independence of the Republic, which from the point of view of international legislation are based on unfailing steps, were mentioned in the report of the Minister.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The XI Eurasian Economic Forum in Verona, in which the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev is participating, has opened on October 25.
More than 1100 delegates from more than 40 states arrived to participate in the work of the Forum. Representatives of public authorities, business circles, political and public figures, diplomats, experts, journalists from Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Brazil, the UK, Hungary, Germany, Greece, Israel, India, Iran, Spain, Italy, Cyprus, China, Luxembourg, Malta, the United Arab Emirates, Poland, Portugal, Russia, Singapore, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, the United States, Finland, France, Croatia, the Czech Republic, Switzerland, Japan and other countries.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
During the visit to the Italian Republic the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev visited the province of Catania, Sicily on October 22.
The city of Randazzo saw a ceremonial meeting of Dmitrii Medoev with Francesco Sgroi, the Mayor of the city. Deputies to the Mayor, public representatives and Eugeny Panteleev, the Consul General of the Russian Federation in Palermo, participated in the meeting.
National anthems of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Italian Republic were performed at the beginning of the event.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Yason Demeev, the Honorary Consul of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Far Eastern Federal District of the Russian Federation, on October 22.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A working visit of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev to the Italian Republic has started on October 22, 2018.
In framework of the tour the Minister will visit the province of Catania where a range of meetings are expected to be held in the municipality of Randazzo, province of Catania. 
On October 25-26 the Minister will participate in the XI Eurasian Economic Forum in Verona.

News_Titles: The message of the South Ossetian delegation for mass media
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the results of the 45th round of the Geneva International Discussions
October 9-10, 2018 saw a regular round of the Geneva International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia, which are conducted in accordance with Medvedev-Sarkozy's agreements dated August 12, 2008 and September 8, 2008. Official delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, delegates from the Republic of Abkhazia, Georgia, the Russian Federation and the USA as well as representatives of the EU, the UN and the OSCE took part in negotiations.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The 45th round of the GID, in which the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitii Medoev is participating, is held in Geneva on October 9-10.
The Geneva International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia, which are held in accordance with Medvedev-Sarkozy's agreements reached after the Georgian armed aggression against South Ossetia in August 2008, will celebrate this October their 10th anniversary. 
The main objective of the Discussions is maintaining stability South Ossetia and Abkhazia. Representatives of Abkhazia, Georgia, South Ossetia, Russia and the USA are participating in the Discussions, chaired by representatives of the EU, the UN and the OSCE. The Discussions are held in two working groups – on security and humanitarian issues.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the visit to Abkhazia a meeting of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev with member of the Abkhazian People’s Assembly Committee for international and interparliamentary relations Dmitrii Ardzinba was held on October 4.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the visit to the Republic of Abkhazia a meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove was held on October 3.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: September 30 saw the official delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, participating in the events, dedicated to the 25th Anniversary of Victory and Independence Day of the Republic of Abkhazia. In framework of the events the delegation laid wreaths at the monument to Vladislav Ardzinba, the first President of the Republic of Abkhazia, located in village Lower Eshera of the Sukhum district.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the visit to the Republic of Abkhazia the South Ossetia President Anatolii Bibilov and members of the South Ossetian delegation participated in the opening ceremony of a monument to the fallen soldiers in the Abkhazian Patriotic War of 1992-1993 in Ochamchira and laid flowers at the monument.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On September 29, 2018 in framework of the visit to Abkhazia the South Ossetian delegation, headed by the South Ossetian President Anatolii Bibilov, laid a wreath at the monument to Sergey Bagapsh, the second President of the Republic of Abkhazia, raised in the village of Dzhgyarda.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the visit to Abkhazia an extended format meeting of the South Ossetian President Anatolii Bibilov and the Abkhazian President Raul Khadzhimba was held on September 29.
During the meeting Anatolii Biblov thanked Raul Khadzhimba for the invitation to participate in celebrations, dedicated to the 25th Anniversary of Victory and Independence Day of the Republic of Abkhazia and on behalf of the people of South Ossetia congratulated the people of Abkhazia with the great day. Alongside with this the South Ossetian President emphasized that it was a common victory over the evil, against which the Abkhazian and the Ossetian people had fought together.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Official delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by Anatolii BIbilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, arrived in the Republic of Abkhazia on September 28 to participate in the festivities, dedicated to the 25th Anniversary of Victory and Independence Day.
Dmitrii Medoev, Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ibragim Gasseev, Minister for Defence, Igor Naniev, Minister of Internal Affairs, Valerii Valiev, Security Council Secretary, Vladimir Kelekhsaev, member of the Parliament, are members of the delegation.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the statement of Georgian Prime Minister Mamuka Bakhtadze at the 73ed session of the UN General Assembly
Sick imagination of Georgian Prime Minister Mamuka Bakhtadze again has led to innuendos. These insinuations, outlined by the Prime Minister at the 73rd session of the UN General Assembly, have nothing to do with the reality and are aimed to convince the international community in improving relations with the Ossetians. Concern about reduce of the South Ossetian population which allegedly happened because of “the grave humanitarian, socioeconomic, and human rights situation” was equally cynical.

News_Titles: Statement by members of the Joint South Ossetia-Russia Demarcation Commission on the results of the first assembly of Commission
News_Shorts:
The first assembly of the Joint South Ossetia-Russia Demarcation Commission was held on September 25-27, 2018 in Moscow.
The assembly was held in an atmosphere of constructive and good neighborliness.
By of the Joint South Ossetia – Russia Demarcation Commission has been signed by the parties. 
The next assembly of the Commission will be held in the Republic of South Ossetia. Dates of the assembly will be determined in due-course through diplomatic channels.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Riad Haddad, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Syrian Arab Republic to the Russian Federation, who arrived in Tskhinval on the occasion of the festivities, dedicated to the Day of the Republic on September 20, 2018.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
September 17 saw Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, heading the South Ossetian delegation at the Geneva International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia, hosting a meeting with the Co-Chairs of the Discussions representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN, who arrived in Tskhinval on a working visit.
Agenda of the forthcoming 45th round of the GID scheduled for October 9-10 has been discussed at the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the 10th Anniversary of the Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation
The 10th anniversary of the Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation is celebrated on September 17, 2018.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On the official reception dedicated to the 9th Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation
A ceremonial reception dedicated to the 10th anniversary of establishment of diplomatic relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation organized by the South Ossetian Foreign Ministry took place in the assembly hall of the South Ossetian State University on September 11.
The South Ossetian President, members of the Government and the Parliament, Russian diplomats - officers of the Embassy of the Russian Federation to the Republic of South Ossetia participated in the event.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the 10th Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation
The 10th anniversary of establishment of diplomatic relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation is celebrated on September 9.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A joint news conference of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev and the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to the Republic of South Ossetia Marat Kulakhmetov dedicated to the 10th anniversary of establishment of diplomatic relations between South Ossetia and Russia was held in the press-center of Sputnik IA on September 7.
The participants of the conference told about development of the interstate relations over the last years and about future joint projects.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A commemoration action in memory of Alexandr Zakharchenko, Head of the Donetsk People’s Republic, who had been killed as a result of a terrorist attack, was held by the Representation of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy on September 3 in Pesaro.
The action took place at the obelisk raised in memory of the Italian guerrillas who were killed by Fascists during the World War II.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A group of deputies of the South Ossetian Oblast Soviet, members of the Soviet of the XX convocation, members of the Parliament of the I convocation, as well as members of the Central Electoral Commission during the Parliamentary elections were awarded by the President of the Republic of South Ossetia Anatolii BIbilov with a medal “In commemoration of the 10th Anniversary of the Victory of the Ossetian Nation in the Patriotic War” on August 31.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the 10th Anniversary of Recognition of the Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia by the Russian Federation
Large scale solemnities, dedicated to the 10th Anniversary of Recognition of the Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia by the Russian Federation will be held on August 26. This date is entered by gold letters in the historical chronicle of the Ossetian people.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Vyacheslav Bitarov, the Head of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, hosted a meeting with Riad Haddad, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Syrian Arab Republic to the Russian Federation, in Vladikavkaz on August 23.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to Noble Partner 2018 – multinational military exercises conducted in Georgia 
Large-scale military exercises Noble Partner 2018, in which more than 3 000 soldiers from 13 NATO member states are participating, started in Georgia for the fourth time on August 01, 2018. The US aircraft and German armored vehicles are involved as well.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Commemorative events dedicated to the 10th anniversary of the military aggression of Georgia against South Ossetia were held in the Republic of South Ossetia on August 7-8.
Similar actions were organized in the embassies of the Republic of South Ossetia in Moscow, Sukhum and Tiraspol.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Georgii Kochity, Director of the Peoples’ Friendship Center of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, Tamara Kaytukova, Deputy Director of the Peoples’ Friendship Center of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, members of the Social Council of Vladikavkaz and the Representative of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania in the Republic of Crimea Valerii Savlaev visited the South Ossetian Consular Agency in Vladikavkaz on August 8.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A commemoration action – a prayer service, dedicated to the 10th anniversary of Georgian military aggression against the Republic of South Ossetia, was conducted under the auspices of the Representation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy on August 8 in Pesaro.
At the Tree of Peace, a walnut-tree which had been planted in Miralfiore Park in commemoration of victims of the Georgian aggression, a group of friends of South Ossetia observed a minute of silence in tribute to the memory of victims of the attack of Georgian troops on the sleeping town on August 8, 2008.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
At the request of Marat Kulakhmetov, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to the Republic of South Ossetia, a meeting with Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, was held on August 7.
During the meeting the Ambassador expressed to the Minister sympathy and condolences on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the Georgian aggression against South Ossetia, when hundreds of innocent people and dozens of Russian peacekeepers were killed. As assured the Ambassador, the memory of innocent victims of those tragic days won’t be condemned to oblivion.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the 10th anniversary of Georgian military aggression against South Ossetia
Over a long period of time South Ossetia has been the object of the predatory aspirations of the Georgian authorities. Since proclamation of the Georgian independence each new leader considered it his duty to start military actions, ethnic cleansings or genocides against the Ossetian people. Many thousands of the Ossetians were killed and massacred as a result of that. The genocides of the Ossetian people in 1920, 1989-1992, the military invasion in 2004 and, finally, the Georgian-Ossetian war in August 2008, in which the military confrontation culminated, left deep open wounds in hearts of the Ossetian people.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Participants of international project Ethnolager 2018 – Trace of the Alans visited the Republic of South Ossetia on July 27-29 and August 5-7.
In framework of the project representatives of the Ossetian communities form Russia, Turkey, Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Germany and France visited South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon an invitation from Sadrettin Kusati, Head of the Ossetian community in Turkey, Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, visited Istanbul and participated on August 4, 2018 in the second international festival of the Ossetian culture, which was organized with the assistance of Alan, Ossetian diaspora in Turkey.
Aslan Tsutsiev, the Minister for National Relations of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, Ruslan Mildzikhov, the Minister for Culture of Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, representatives of North Caucasus diasporas in Turkey and the diplomatic corps accredited in Turkey participated in the event as well.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The jubilee Fifth Young Diplomats Forum, organized by the Board of Young Diplomats under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation with the assistance of the Alexander Gorchakov Public Diplomacy Fund, was held in Moscow on July 26-27, 2018.
Upon an invitation from the organizers, representatives of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, delegates from Abkhazia, Armenia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Russia and Tajikistan participated in the work of the Forum.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: July 29 saw a meeting of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia Anatolii Bibilov with representatives of the Ossetian communities from different counties of the world – the participants of cultural education project Ethnolager 2018 – Trace of the Alans.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The official visit of the South Ossetian President Anatolii Bibilov to the Syrian Arab Republic finished on July 25.
An informal meeting of Anatolii Bibilov and Bashar al-Assad, the Presidents of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Syrian Arab Republic, was held on the day of the departure. The two leaders summarized the results of the visit and took leaves.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the official visit to the Syrian Arab Republic the South Ossetian delegation, headed by President Anatolii Bibilov, met with representatives of the Government and the Parliament of Syria on July 25.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the official visit to the Syrian Arab Republic the delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by President Anatolii Bibilov, visit the main sanctuaries of Syria.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the official visit to the Syrian Arab Republic a meeting of the South Ossetian President Anatolii Bibilov with representatives of the Ossetian community in Syria was held on July 24.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The jubilee Young Diplomats Forum of CIS countries, organized by the Board of Young Diplomats under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation with the assistance of the Alexander Gorchakov Public Diplomacy Fund will take place on July 26-27 in Moscow.
Representatives of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia will participate in the Forum among delegates from other states.
Global changes in the system of international affairs and digitization of global economy as well as the role of the Young Diplomats International Association in horizontal diplomacy will be main subjects of discussion.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the official visit to the Syrian Arab Republic the delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by President Anatolii Bibilov, laid a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier in Damascus.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit to the Syrian Arab Republic negotiations between Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Bashar al-Assad, the President of the Syrian Arab Republic, were held on July 23 in the Presidential Palace in Damascus.
The meeting continued in an extended format with the participation of representatives of both states.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, arrived on an official visit to the Syrian Arab Republic on July 23.
Igor Kozaev, Chief of Administration of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, Dmitrii Medoev, Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ibragim Gasseev, Minister for Defence, Alan Tadtaev, Minister for Civil Defense, Emergency Management and Natural Disasters Response, and Gennadii Kokoev, the Minister of Economic Development, are members of the South Ossetian official delegation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the preparations to the official visit of Anatlii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, to the Syrian Arab Republic, a meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Walid Muallem, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Syrian Arab Republic, was organized on July 22.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
July 20 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, leaving for the Syrian Arab Republic on an official visit.
The delegation, which heads off to Damascus to make arrangements for the forthcoming official visit of the South Ossetian President Anatolii Bibilov to the Syrian Arab Republic that would take place in a short period of time, includes officers of the Foreign Ministry and the Administration of the President.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The resolution titled “10 Years after the August War”, which calls for Russia to revoke recognition of the independence of South Ossetia and Abkhazia and to withdraw its troops from the territory of Georgia, was adopted at the annual session of the OSCE Parliamentary Assembly in Berlin on July 11. The desire to include Georgia in NATO was reaffirmed by the authorities of the Alliance at NATO summit in Brussels on the same day.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Andrey Tibilov, the Representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Brazil, on July 5.
Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in the meeting as well.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The so-called Otkhozoria-Tatunashvili sanction list, which includes citizens of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Abkhazia, who allegedly in various periods of time had committed various offences against Georgian nationals, was published in Georgia on June 26, 2018.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The statement of Georgian Foreign Minister David Zalkaliani pertaining to the measures undertaken by the Parliament of the Republic of South Ossetia in relation to issues of several civilians from village Tshnelis, who as a result of demarcation found themselves beyond the South Ossetian borders, wasn’t left without attention in Tskhinval.
One cannot name the distorted perception of the picture of the world otherwise than oneiric, when fragments of the real world are mixed with fantastic images.

News_Titles: The message of the South Ossetian delegation for mass media
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the results of the 44th round of the Geneva International Discussions
June 19-20, 2018 saw the 44th round of the Geneva International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia. A delegation from the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, delegations from the Republic of Abkhazia, Georgia, the Russian Federation and the USA as well as representatives of the EU, the UN and the OSCE took part in negotiations.

News_Titles: Joint statement of South Ossetian and Abkhazian delegations on the Geneva International Discussions on security and stability in Transcaucasia
News_Shorts: For several years already has been the UN General Assembly accepting draft resolution on refugees and displaced persons from South Ossetia and Abkhazia prepared by Georgian party. While delivering again and again the same writing of the document Georgia tries to impose on international community a unilateral politicized vision of the problem of refugees in order to support its non-legitimate territorial claims.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: June 20, 2018 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosting a meeting with Marat Kulakhmetov, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: June 14 saw Georgian Prosecutor General’s Office investigating the case of Archil Tatunashvili bringing charges against two members of law enforcement agencies of the Republic of South Ossetia and urging the South Ossetian citizens to come to the police department of the neighboring state.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the adoption of another Georgian resolution by the European Parliament
The resolution titled “Occupied Territories of Georgia – 10 years after the Russian Invasion”, in which the European Parliament supports the territorial integrity and sovereignty of Georgia and calls for Russia to revoke its decision on the recognition of the independence of South Ossetia and Abkhazia, was adopted at the session of the European Parliament on June 14, 2018.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
June 7 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia hosting a meeting with Ashot Astabatsyan, the new Head of the Representation of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) in the Republic of South Ossetia.
Issues, related to the work of the ICRC Representation in South Ossetia and programs of the Committee for the nearest period were discussed during the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In accordance with the Project of A. N. Severtsov Institute of Ecology and Evolution of the RAS and RusHydro on preparing an area in Ossetia for the Persian Leopard Reintroduction, a solemn ceremony of laying 12 paw prints of the Persian Leopard took place with the support from the Administration of Vladikavkaz on May 31.
Laying the paw prints is a part of a sculptural composition titled “Leopard Reintroduction in Caucasus”, which is built in framework of the ecological awareness promotion program titled “Project on preparing an area for release of Persian Leopards in Ossetia”.

News_Titles: Communique of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia On mutual recognition and establishment of diplomatic relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Syrian Arab Republic
News_Shorts:
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, being authorized by the Government, has the honor to state that the Republic of South Ossetia and the Syrian Arab Republic,
Reaffirming their commitment to general principles of international law,
Being guided by the desire to establish and develop full-fledged political, economic and cultural interaction between the two states for the benefit of the two nations,

News_Titles: The 26th Anniversary of the Act of Declaration of Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
May 29, 1992 is a special date in the heroic history of the people of South Ossetia.
At the height of the Georgian military aggression against South Ossetia the Supreme Council of the Republic of South Ossetia adopted the Act of Declaration of Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia 26 years ago on this day. 
Adoption of the Act of Declaration of Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia was anticipated by a long-lasting struggle of the people of South Ossetia against Georgian nationalism, which aimed at extermination or total expulsion of the Ossetians from their Motherland, and by consistent, legally checked steps, aimed at legal formation of the state, which was created in accordance with the will of the nation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: At the end of the visit to the Italian Republic Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Alan Kochiev, the Mayor of Tskhinval, together with Fillipo Gasperi, the Mayor of Gradara, visited the memorial to resistance fighters of the province of Pesaro, victims of the World War II, and laid flowers to the memorial tablet.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A news conference of Alan Kochiev and Fillipo Gasperi, Mayors of Tskhinval and Gradara, on the signing of the Agreement on Cooperation between the Administration of Tskhinval (the Republic of South Ossetia) and the Municipality of Gradara (the province of Pesaro and Urbino, the Italian Republic) was held in the capital of the province of Pesaro on May 25, 2018 in framework of the visit of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Alan Kochiev, the Mayor of Tskhinval, to the Italian Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the visit of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev and the Mayor of Tskhinval Alan Kochiev to the Italian Republic, an Agreement on Cooperation between the Administration of Tskhinval (the Republic of South Ossetia) and the Municipality of Gradara (the province of Pesaro and Urbino, the Italian Republic) was signed in the town of Gradara on May 24.
Alan Kochiev and Fillipo Gasperi, Mayors of Tskhinval and Gradara, signed the Agreement.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
May 23 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, and Alan Kochiev, the Mayor of Tskhinval, arriving upon an invitation from Fillipo Gasperi, Mayor of Gradara, in the town of Gradara (the Italian Republic).
During a meeting with Mr. Gasperi the parties discussed the prospects of mutually beneficial cooperation between Tskhinval and Gradara in spheres of urban infrastructure, culture, tourism, as well as trade and entrepreneurship.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Working meeting of the South Ossetian delegation at the GID, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, and the Co-Chairs of the Discussions, representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN, took place in Tskhinval on May 23.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: As it became known, May 18 saw signing of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Federal Council of the Swiss Confederation, according to which the Russian Federation has completed the procedure necessary for launching the implementation of the Agreement on the basic principles for a mechanism of customs administration and monitoring of trade in goods signed with Georgia on November 9, 2011.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
May 20 is annually celebrated in South Ossetia as the Commemoration day of victims of the Georgian aggression. On this day in 1992 the roundabout way nearby the Ossetian village Zar became a scene of the atrocity committed by Georgian extremists. A column of South Ossetian refugees was shot down at point-blank range from an ambush. Thirty three persons, mostly children, women and elderly, were killed as a result of that barbarous action; about twenty persons were badly wounded.
According to the established tradition a mourning meeting was held at the monument “Mourning mother” raised at place of the tragedy. Officers of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia participated in the meeting. Victims of not only the Zar tragedy, but also all those who had been killed throughout of the many years-lasting Georgian-Ossetian conflict, who had sacrificed their lives for the independence of the Motherland, were commemorated at the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
May 17 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, together with representatives of Foreign Ministries of the Russian Federation, the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic and the Republic of Artsakh, who had arrived in Sukhum on the occasion of the festivities, dedicated to the 25th anniversary of the establishment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, meeting with Raul Khadzhimba, the President of the Republic of Abkhazia.
The President welcomed the guests, thanked them for participation in the festivities and noted the importance of development and strengthening of relations with friendly states.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the festivities, dedicated to 25th anniversary of the establishment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, a trilateral working meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, and Vitaly Ignatiev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, was organized on May 17, 2018.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the working visit to Abkhazia the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev participated in the solemnities, dedicated to the 25th anniversary of the establishment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia on May 17.
The festivities began in the Sukhum Park of Glory, where wreaths were laid to the Memorial to victims of the Abkhazian Patriotic War of 1992-1993.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On May 16 in framework of the working visit to Abkhazia Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in a scientific conference entitled “The Republic of Abkhazia: struggle for the independence, present-day realities and perspectives”, dedicated to the 25th Anniversary of the Independence and the Victory in the Abkhazian Patriotic War of 1992-1993 and the 10th Anniversary of its Recognition by the Russian Federation.
Raul Khadzhimba, the President of the Republic of Abkhazia, Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, as well as figures of science and culture, participated in the conference, organized in the Sukhum Museum of Military Glory named after Vladislav Ardzinba.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the working visit to Abkhazia the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev visited on May 15 the Embassy of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Republic of Abkhazia and met with Oleg Botsiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Republic of Abkhazia, and officers of the Embassy.
The main aspects of work conducted by the Embassy, in particular, terms of strengthening friendly and business ties between corresponding agencies of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Abkhazia were discussed at the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Upon an invitation from Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, arrived in the Republic of Abkhazia on a working visit, which will last from May 14 till May 18. In framework of the visit the Minister will participate in celebrations, dedicated to the 25th anniversary of the establishment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of a working visit to Moscow the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev met with Deputy Executive Director of the Alexander Gorchakov Public Diplomacy Fund Roman Grishenin and Advisor to the Executive Director of the Fund, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Valery Kenyaykin on May 11.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the working visit to the Republic of Artsakh the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev met with Araik Arutyunyan, State Minister of Nagorno-Karabakh, on May 2.
Perspectives and plans for extending the bilateral cooperation in various spheres were discussed during the meeting. Special attention was paid to the development of business and economic ties.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the working visit to the Republic of Artsakh Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the State of Alania, met with Masis Mailyan, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Artsakh, on April 29.
Wide range of issues related to the bilateral cooperation, including interaction in framework of the Protocol on Cooperation and Consultations, signed between Foreign Ministries of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Artsakh in 2001, as well as extension of the legal base were discussed during the meeting. Exchange of opinion on current regional and international agenda took place as well.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon an invitation from the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Artsakh Masis Mailyan Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, left for Stepanakert on a working visit on April 27.
During the visit the parties will discuss current terms of the bilateral relations, promising areas of further cooperation and the situation in the region.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: April 24 saw a meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Grigoriy Karasin, State Secretary, Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, organized in the Russian Foreign Ministry.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in the assembly of the International Association of Friends of Crimea, which was held in framework of the IV Yalta International Economic Forum on April 20.
On behalf of the South Ossetian Club of Friends of Crimea Dmitrii Medoev welcomed the attendees and expressed gratitude for the invitation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A meeting of Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and a group of Italian senators and businessmen - participants of the IV Yalta International Economic Forum was held on the margins of the Forum on April 20.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On the margins of the IV Yalta International Economic Forum Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, met with Mitsuhiro Kimura, Chairman of the Issukai Far-right Political party (Japan) April 20.
Range of issues of mutual interest was discussed during the meeting. 
The parties agreed to establish and develop inter-parliamentary ties between the Edinaya Ossetia Political party of South Ossetia and the Issukai Far-right Political party of Japan. 
Alongside with this Mitsuhiro Kimura accepted with gratitude the invitation of Dmitrii Medoev to visit South Ossetia. 
A delegation from the Issukai Far-right Political party, headed by its leader Mitsuhiro Kimura, visited South Ossetia after the August War of 2008 and condemned the Georgian aggression against South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A meeting of Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Sergey Aksenov, the Head of the Republic of Crimea, took place in framework of the IV Yalta International Economic Forum on April 20.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the IV Yalta International Economic Forum Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, met with Petros Tseggay Asged, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the State of Eritrea to the Russian Federation, on April 19.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
I framework of the IV Yalta International Economic Forum Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, met with the official delegation of the Syrian Arab Republic, headed by Samer Al-Khalil, the Minister of Economy and Foreign Trade, on April 19.
Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, Gennadii Kokoev, the Minister of Economic Development, and Znaur Gassiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Russian Federation, participated in the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
April 19 saw Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and members of the South Ossetian delegation participating in solemn opening ceremony of the IV Yalta International Economic Forum.
In his welcoming speech Anatolii Bibilov told participants and guests of the Forum about the perspectives, which would extension of contacts with the Republic of Crimea and the Russian Federation give to the states - participants of the Forum.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: April 18 saw Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, leaving for the Republic of Crimea, where he will upon an invitation from Sergey Aksenov, the Head of the Republic of Crimea, participate in the IV Yalta International Economic Forum on April 19-21.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Pertaining to escalation of situation in SyriaThe Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia strongly condemns the night air attacks on the Syrian territory and considers these actions as illegal military interference under far-fetched and fabricated pretext.

News_Titles: Statement of Petr Gassiev, the Chairman of the Parliament of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
We in the Parliament of the Republic of South Ossetia have heard with anxiety and bewilderment the news about the barbarous air strike by the USA, the Great Britain and France on the territory of a sovereign state – the Syrian Arab Republic.
This unwarranted military action, which looks like a classic military adventure, will without any doubt damage the fragile peace that has established after the many-years-long civil war in Syria.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Protocol to the Agreement on Cooperation on Persian leopard recruitment, conservation and monitoring in the Republic of South Ossetia has been signed with the assistance of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia on April 13, 2018 in Tskhinval.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Pertaining to “peaceful initiatives” of GeorgiaGeorgian authorities, having recognized the impossibility of “returning back” South Ossetia and Abkhazia forcefully in short term, has changed its tactics. Now the concept of peaceful reconciliation titled “State Strategy on Occupied Territories: Engagement Through Cooperation” and number of so-called peaceful humanitarian initiatives, which are loudly advertised in the world by the official Tbilisi, are on the agenda.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A meeting of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev with Vladimir Koshelev, a merited polar explorer of the USSR, Assistant to Deputy Chairman of the Russian State Duma, and Victor Bunin, a merited citizen of Tskhinval, took place in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia on April 2, 2018.

News_Titles: The message of the South Ossetian delegation for mass media
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the results of the 43rd round of the Geneva International Discussions
March 27-28, 2018 saw a regular round of the Geneva International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia. A delegation from the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, delegations from the Republic of Abkhazia, Georgia, the Russian Federation and the USA as well as representatives of the EU, the UN and the OSCE took part in negotiations.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On March 28 Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, visited the Embassy of the Russian Federation in the Republic of South Ossetia and left a record in the Book of condolences in honor of the victims of Kemerovo shopping mall fire.
Tskhinval, March 28, 2018

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On March 26 the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev hosted a meeting with the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation in the Republic of South Ossetia Marat Kulakhmetov.
During the meeting Dmitrii Medoev expressed his deep condolences over the loss of lives in Kemerovo shopping mall fire, expressed words of encouragement and sympathy to the injured and wished them a speedy recovery.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The Official Representative of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania in the Republic of Crimea and the city of Sevastopol Valeriy Savlaev and his wife and Ossetian artists from Moscow Vladimir Gobozov and Georgiy Gobozov visited the South Ossetian Foreign Ministry on March 26.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Opening ceremony of a memorial plaque to Znaur Gassiev, installed on the house where the political patriarch of South Ossetia lived, took place on March 26.
Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, Erik Pukhaev, the Prime Minister, Petr Gassiev, the Chairman of the Parliament of the Republic of South Ossetia, Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, Znaur Gassiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Russian Federation, and public figures took part in the ceremony.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of a working visit to Moscow on March 19-22, Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, held a number of important meetings with representatives of government authorities of the Russian Federation in Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs inclusive.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister and head of the executive group, chaired another assembly of the group, organized to ensure the holding of Russian presidential elections, appointed for March 18, 2018, in the territory of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Comment to Netgazeti
News_Shorts: Following a request from Georgian online edition Netgazeti, Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister commented the statement of Georgian Prime Minister Giorgi Kvirikashvili, addressed to “the highest authorities of Russia”.

News_Titles: Medoev on the danger of linking Tatunashvili's theme with the continuation of the Geneva discussions
News_Shorts: President of South Ossetia Anatoly Bibilov, during a meeting with the co-chairs of the Geneva discussions, confirmed the firm position of the Republic aimed at a peaceful and civilized solution of all existing issues, said Foreign Minister of the RSO Dmitry Medoev in a comment to the news agency “Res”.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, heading the South Ossetian delegation at the GID, met with the Co-Chairs of the Discussions, representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN, in Tskhinval on March 5.
Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with the Co-Chairs of the Geneva Discussions on the same day.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
March 7, 2018 saw another assembly of the executive group, organized at the Direction of Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, dated January 15, 2018 on establishment of an executive group, affiliated with the South Ossetian Presidential Administration, to ensure the holding of the presidential elections in the territory of the Republic of South Ossetia, appointed for March 18, 2018.
The South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev, the Deputy Chief of Administration of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia Konstantin Pukhaev, the Chairman of Central Electoral Commission of the Republic of South Ossetia Bella Plieva, Head of Foreign Policy Directorate of Administration of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Vaneev, the Minister of Education Natali Gassieva, the Chairman of the State Committee on Information and Press Maria Kotaeva and heads of the South Ossetian regions were present at the meeting. Sergey Manko, Counsellor of the Embassy of the Russian Federation in the Republic of South Ossetia, was invited to the meeting as well.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On the occasion of termination of his diplomatic mission as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Nicaragua in the Republic of South Ossetia, Juan Ernesto Vásquez Araya met with Andrey Tskhovrebov, the First Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, in the Embassy of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Russian Federation on March 5, 2018.
During the meeting, which was held in a friendly atmosphere, the parties highly assessed the state and the perspectives of strengthening the South Ossetian-Nicaraguan cooperation and determined further steps aimed at its development.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: March 6, 2018 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosting a meeting with Marat Kulakhmetov, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation in South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Dmitrii Medoev: South Ossetia is interested in holding the election of the Russian President at a high level
News_Shorts: The South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev, heading the executive group on ensuring the holding of the presidential elections in the territory of the Republic of South Ossetia, gave an interview to Res IA where told about the work conducted and the importance of this political event for the Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Alan Elbakiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Republic of South Ossetia, on March 5, 2018.
The parties exchanged opinion on current level of South Ossetian-Abkhazian relations and discussed issues, related to the bilateral cooperation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
During a working visit to the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev visited the Consular Agency of the Republic of South Ossetia in Vladikavkaz and met with Moris Sanakoev, the Head of the Agency, and employees of the office.
The Minister got acquainted with working conditions and held a working meeting with officers of the Agency.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In framework of the working visit to the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania a meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, with Aslan Tsutsiev, the Minister for National Relations of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, was held on March 1, 2018.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Passions related to the death of a Georgian citizen Archil Tatunashvili, who died in the State hospital in Tskhinval, are being inflamed in Georgia. On February 22, 2018 Archil Tatunashvili was detained by law enforcement agencies of South Ossetia in Leningor on suspicion of reconnaissance and sabotage activities and involvement in murders of civilians during military aggression of Georgia against South Ossetia in August 2008.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: February 21, 2018 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosting a meeting with a group of mountain skiers from Catalonia and Andorra, members of Himalaiaski Club, who had made several high-altitude climbs in South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
February 10, 2018 saw a meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, with Yason Demeev, the Honorary Consul of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Far Eastern Federal District of the Russian Federation, organized in Vladivostok.
The Representative of South Ossetia informed the Minister about the activity, conducted in the Far East. In his turn the Minister set the priority tasks, which would promote more effective cooperation of South Ossetia with Vladivostok and the Far East Federal District in general. 
On the same day the Minister met with activists of the Ossetian community of the Primorsky Territory of the Russian Federation. The meeting was held in a friendly atmosphere.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, with Vitaly Verkeenko, the mayor of Vladivostok, took place in the administration of Vladivostok on February 9. 2018.
During the negotiations the parties discussed the perspectives of bilateral cooperation between Tskhinval and Vladivostok in different areas, the possibilities of implementation of joint humanitarian projects including those for the youth. Special attention was drawn to interaction in sphere of culture and cultural exchanges. This, in particular, was related to organizing exhibitions, concerts and other events.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On his way home after the official visit to the Republic of Nauru, Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, made a short stop in Seoul, the Republic of Korea.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In conclusion of the official visit to Nauru, the official ceremony of signing bilateral South Ossetian - Nauruan intergovernmental documents took place in Yaren on February 3, 2018.
The Memorandum of understanding on cooperation and interaction on international relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Nauru and the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Government of Republic of Nauru on waiver of visa requirements for mutual visits of nationals of the two countries were signed by Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Baron Divavesi Waqa, the President of the Republic of Nauru.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the discussion on implementing the Russian-Georgian agreement on customs administration and monitoring of trade in goods
Possibility of implementing the bilateral Russian-Georgian agreement on customs administration and monitoring of trade in goods signed in November 2011 has again become widely discussed in media recently.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev to Nauru a meeting with the Speaker of the Parliament of the Republic of Nauru Cyril Buraman has been organized on February 2, 2017.
During the meeting Dmitrii Medoev expressed gratitude to Cyril Buraman for the invitation to visit the Parliament of the Republic of Nauru and thanked the authorities of Nauru for organizing the official visit to the Republic on such an important day. The Minister emphasized the warm welcome extended to the South Ossetian delegation during its stay in Nauru, noted the high level of organization and the accurate and coordinated work of all agencies, responsible for protocol and events. As it was emphasized by Dmitrii Medoev, in South Ossetia they are grateful for the Act of Recognition of the Independence of South Ossetia by the Government of Nauru, dated December 16, 2009.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit to Nauru a trilateral meeting between representatives of three friendly states – the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove and the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to Nauru Grigorii Loginov has been organized on February 1, 2018.
Positive development of traditionally friendly South Ossetian-Abkhaz-Russian relations, including active political dialogue on relevant terms of regional and international agenda, expectations of further strengthening mutually beneficial cooperation in various spheres were marked during the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit of Dmitrii Medoev to Nauru a range of meetings between the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia and representatives of international delegations were held.
January 31, 2017 saw a meeting of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev with His Excellency Peter M. Christian, the President of the Federated States of Micronesia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
January 31, 2017 saw Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participating in the solemnities, dedicated to the 50th Independence Day of the Republic of Nauru.
Official events started with the ceremony of raising the National Flag, accompanied by the National Anthem of the Republic of Nauru, performed by the church choir at the square in front of the Government House. 
The President of Nauru Baron Waqa addressed the attendees with a congratulatory speech, followed by a parade of the police units and other special units of the Republic, as well as citizens of Nauru, employees of government agencies, pupils, sportsmen and representatives of tribes, inhabiting the island.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A study visit of Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, with a group of guests of the Republic of Nauru to the central part of Nauru Island, where phosphates - the strategic natural resources are exploited, was organized on January 30, 2017.
Peter Christian, the President of the Federated States of Micronesia, and Grigorii Loginov, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to Nauru, took part in the visit as well. 
In framework of the official events, dedicated to the 50th Independence Day of the Republic of Nauru, an ethnographic exhibition was opened in Yaren, where traditional buildings, instruments of labor, domestic artifacts of not only the people of Nauru, but also the people of Fiji, Tuvalu, Guam and Micronesia were presented.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On January 28, 2018 in framework of the official visit to Nauru the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev participated in a solemn mass on the occasion of the 50th Independence Day of the Republic, held in the Cathedral of the city of Anibare.
Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, participated in the event as well. 
H.E. Honorable Baron Waqa, the President of the Republic of Nauru, members of Government and Parliament of Nauru, high guests – Heads of friendly states as well as Ministers attended the mass.
In honor of the guests a festive dinner was held after the mass.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Baron Waqa, the President of the Republic of Nauru, hosted a meeting with Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, on January 26, 2018 in his residence.
During the reception the Minister thanked the President for the invitation and on behalf of the South Ossetian authorities once again expressed words of gratitude for the decision to recognize the independence of the Republic of South Ossetia made in 2009. 
Alongside with this Minister Medoev handed the congratulatory letter from Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, addressed to Baron Waqa, the President of the Republic of Nauru, on the occasion of the main national holiday – the Independence Day.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On January 26 in framework of the official visit to Nauru the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev participated in the launch of a new diesel power station constructed with the assistance of Australia, India and Taiwan, supported by the EU.
The project is of vital importance for the Republic of Nauru, since it provides secure functioning of the infrastructure of the whole state. 
At the solemn opening ceremony the President of the Republic of Nauru Baron Waqa cut the ribbon and launched the station. 
In his welcoming speech President Waqa congratulated the audience with a wonderful gift for the 50th Independence Day of Nauru and emphasized that construction and launch of the object would ensure stable electrical power supply.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon an invitation from Baron Waqa, the President of the Republic of Nauru, Dmitrii Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, will visit the Republic of Nauru since January 25 till February 4, 2018.
