On January 31, 2018 the Minister will participate in the festivities, dedicated to the 50th Independence Day of the Republic of Nauru.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, with Grigoriy Karasin, State Secretary, Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, was held in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation on January 22, 2018.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: January 18, 2018 saw the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia hosting the first meeting of the executive group, organized at the Direction of Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, dated January 15, 2018 on establishment of an executive group, affiliated with the South Ossetian Presidential Administration, to ensure the holding of the presidential elections in the territory of the Republic of South Ossetia, appointed for March 18, 2018.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: January 17 saw the State Committee on Information and Press holding a news conference of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, on the results of the official visit of Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, to the Republic of Srpska and Belgrade.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
His Holiness Patriarch Irinej of Serbia hosted in his residence a meeting with Anatolii Bibiliv, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, on January 12, 2018.
During the meeting the parties discussed general issues of mutual interest related to Christianity. 
The South Ossetian President thanked His Holiness for the audience and congratulated the Patriarch with Christmas, having noted the special role of Orthodoxy in the history and modern life of the people of South Ossetia. The President emphasized that the priority role of Orthodoxy in South Ossetia is stipulated by the Constitution of the Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In conclusion of the official visit to the Republic of Srpska and Belgrade Anatolii Bibilov, the South Ossetian President, and members of the South Ossetian delegation visited the Church of Saint Sava in Belgrade on January 12, 2018.
Father Stefan, the Beneficiary of the Church, told the guests about the history of construction and reconstruction of the main sanctuary of the Serbian Orthodox Church. 
The Church of Saint Sava is one of the biggest Orthodox cathedrals in the Europe, which impresses with its grandeur and scale. The Church of Saint Sava in Vracar plateau stands on the same place where the Ottoman Turks enslaving Serbian lands barbarously burned the relics of the greatest saint and the first Archbishop of Serbia. 
Later the delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia visited the metochion of the Russian Orthodox Church in Belgrade – the Church of Holy Trinity.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On January 11 in the White Palace, the residence of Serbian royal dynasty, Crown Prince Alexander II Karadjordjevic and Crown Princess Katherine hosted a meeting with the President of the Republic of South Ossetia Anatolii Bibilov.
The President thanked the royal couple for hospitality and warm reception, told about certain aspects of the Ossetian history, which is inextricably bound up with the history of Russia and Russian people, and assured of the inviolability of the historic alliance between Ossetia and Russia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Following the agreements reached at the meeting of the South Ossetian President Anatolii Bibilov and the President of the Republic of Srpska, which took place in framework of the official visit of President Bibilov to Banja Luka, Gela Valiev, Council of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, was appointed as the Representative of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Republic of Srpska.
Appointment of the Representative of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Republic of Srpska will promote, first of all, development of bilateral cooperation in cultural and humanitarian spheres.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
January 11, 2018 saw a meeting of Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, with Ljubisa Cosic, Head of East Sarajevo municipality.
During the meeting the parties discussed issues of development of friendly relations and ways of cooperation between Tskhinval and East Sarajevo, in particular in spheres of education and culture. The parties expressed readiness to promote establishment and strengthening of inter-municipal cooperation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and members of the South Ossetian delegation laid a wreath to the monument “Twelve Stars”, located in front of the Museum of Contemporary Art of Banja Luka on January 10, 2018.
The monument was raised in commemoration of the 12 children who died because of the lack of oxygen in the intensive care unit of the maternity hospital of Banja Luka in 1992 and reminds of the newborns who were cut off lives.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit to the Republic of Srpska a meeting of Milorad Dodik, the President of the Republic of Srpska, and Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, took place on January 10, 2018.
The parties discussed the perspectives of development of the bilateral cooperation in general and interaction in cultural and humanitarian spheres in particular. The Presidents exchanged opinion on current international problems and talked about certain issues of mutual interest.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, heading the South Ossetian delegation, participated in the festive events, dedicated to the 26th Anniversary of the Republic of Srpska on January 26, 2018.
The official program of celebrations began with the laying of a wreath at the memorial to the Serbs who died in the Bosnian Wars in 1990-s.
On the occasion of the holiday a traditional military parade was held at the Square of Krajina.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
January 9, 2018 saw the President of the Republic of South Ossetia Anatolii Bibilov and members of the South Ossetian official delegation attending the festive liturgy in honor of the Holy First-Martyr and Archdeacon Stefan, the patron saint of the Republic of Srpska, served by His Holiness Patriarch Irinej of Serbia at the Cathedral of Christ the Saviour in Banja Luka.
The President of the Republic of Srpska Milorad Dodik, Crown Prince Alexander II Karadjordjevic with his wife, members of the Government of the Republic of Srpska and the Republic of Serbia attended the liturgy among many of the faithful. 
On January 9 the Republic of Srpska of Bosnia and Herzegovina celebrates its main national holiday - the Day of the Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The official visit of Anatolii Biblov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, to the Republic of Srpska has started.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Upon an invitation from Milorad Dodik, the President of the Republic of Srpska of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, will participate in the festivities, dedicated to the Day of the Republic of Srpska, in framework of his official visit to the Republic of Srpska on January 8-13, 2018.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Exchange of ratifications of the Treaty on Friendship, Cooperation and Partnership signed between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic took place in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia on December 22, 2017.

News_Titles: The message of the South Ossetian delegation for mass media
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the results of the 42ndround of the Geneva International Discussions
December 12-13, 2017 saw a regular round of the Geneva International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia. A delegation from the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, delegations from the Republic of Abkhazia, Georgia, the Russian Federation and the USA as well as representatives of the EU, the UN and the OSCE took part in negotiations. 
As usual, the discussions were held in two working groups: on security and humanitarian issues.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: December 14 saw a briefing of Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, organized for the South Ossetian media representatives upon a visit of the Minister to Belgium and France.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
December 8, 2017 saw a meeting of Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, with Laura Arys-Djanaeva, the President of Ossetian Association in France “Alania”, which marked the end of the visit of the Minister to France.
During the meeting the parties emphasized directions of practical interaction with the Ossetian community in France in cultural, scientific and humanitarian spheres. Mutual consent to maintain regular contacts and use the existing potential for overcoming common challenges was expressed.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon an invitation from Count Peter Sheremetev, a famous cultural worker, philanthropist and public figure, Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, visited Sergei Rachmaninoff Russian Conservatory of Paris on December 8, 2017 in framework of his visit to France.
Count Peter Sheremetev is chairman of the Russian Musical Society in Paris, director of the Russian Conservatory of Paris and chairman of the Presidium of the International Council of Russian Compatriots. 
During the meeting, which was held in a friendly atmosphere, the Minister took a brief journey into the history of South Ossetia and shared features of traditional culture of the Ossetians. In his turn Count Sheremetev told about the history of the Russian Conservatory, its traditions and current activities.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, met with representatives of the Ossetian community in France on December 7, 2017 in the House of Associations in Paris.
During the meeting the Minister told about the social and economic situation in South Ossetia, the priority directions of foreign and domestic policy of the Republic, the work on strengthening ties between South Ossetia and Ossetian communities, and answered numerous questions of representatives of the association.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon an invitation from Laura Arys-Djanaeva, the President of Ossetian Association in France “Alania”, Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, arrived in France on December 7, 2017.
In framework of the visit Minister Medoev met with Ekaterina Solonitskaya, Head of the Russian Center for Science and Culture in Paris. 
During the meeting the participants discussed perspectives of development of humanitarian and cultural cooperation, possibilities of implementation of joint projects and other issues of mutual interest.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Gairbek Salbiev, the Chairman of Darial Public Movement, which unites natives and citizens of the Kazbegi region of Georgia. Representatives of the organization have numerous times claimed about violation of their rights by Georgian authorities.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
December 4, 2017 saw a working meeting of Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Vitaly Ignatiev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, organized at the margins of the 11th European Russian Forum in the European Parliament in Brussels.
Issues of mutual interests were discussed during the meeting. In particular, the Ministers talked about strengthening interaction between foreign policy agencies of the two states.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: December 3-4, 2017 saw the 11th European Russian Forum entitled “EU 2017 and Russian Revolution 1917: Lessons not Learned”, which was held in the headquarters of the European Parliament in Brussels.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The 11th European Russian Forum entitled “EU 2017 and Russian Revolution 1917: Lessons not Learned”, will take place in the European Parliament in Brussels, Belgium on December 3-4, 2017.
The South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitrii Medoev, who arrived in Brussels upon an invitation from Tatjana Zdanoka, Member of the European Parliament and the President of the European Russian Alliance, will make a report as well.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Andrey Tskhovrebov, the First Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Farrukh Islomov, Head of the Representation of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) in the Republic of South Ossetia, on December 1, 2017.
During the meeting Mr. Islomov reported on the humanitarian programs, implemented in South Ossetia in 2017, and the work of the Committee, planned for 2018. Head of the Representation expressed gratitude to the Ministry as the hosting party for the on-going positive support to the activities of the Mission in territory of the Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Negotiations between Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Raul Khadzhimba, the President of the Republic of Abkhazia, who arrived in Tskhinval on an official visit, took place in the Residence of the South Ossetian President on November 26, 2017.
The Presidents discussed terms of further development and strengthening of the South Ossetian-Abkhazian relations and exchanged opinion on current issues of international agenda. 
Later the South Ossetian and the Abkhazian parties held extended-format talks.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon an invitation from Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, Raul Khadzhimba, the President of the Republic of Abkhazia, arrived in Tskhinval on an official visit on November 26, 2017.
The official delegation included Daur Arshba, Chief of Administration of the President of the Republic of Abkhazia, Daur Kove, Minister of Foreign Affairs, Adgur Kakoba, Minister of Education and Daur Tarba, Minister of Agriculture. 
To pay tribute to victims of the Georgian aggression the Abkhazian President Raul Khadzhimba laid wreaths at the Chapel at the Memorial cemetery of Tskhinval school №5. 
The guard of honor paraded, the national flags of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Abkhazia were raised, and anthems were played at the Residence of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia at the solemn ceremony of welcoming the President of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: In anticipation of the official visit of Raul Khadzhimba, the President of the Republic of Abkhazia, to the Republic of South Ossetia, Anatolii Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, signed a Decree, dated November 26, 2017, on pardoning Georgian citizen Giorgi Giunashvili, sentenced by the Supreme Court of the Republic of South Ossetia on February 3, 2017.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Upon an invitation from Gennadiy Zuganov, the Chairman of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation (KPRF), Mauro Murgia, the Representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy, visited Moscow on November 23, 2017.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On the occasion of the Day of Bravery and National Union 
Commemorative events, dedicated to the Day of Bravery and National Union, are held in the Republic of South Ossetia on November 23. This great day went down in history of South Ossetia as a symbol of stout-heartedness and unity of the nation in its struggle against the Georgian aggression. 
On November 23, 1989 under the pretext of a peaceful demonstration, the Georgian nationalists, headed by Zviad Gamsakhurdia, organized a several thousand strong march towards Tskhinval. 
Having spontaneously formed a small group, unarmed South Ossetian young men blocked the road entering the town and stopped the column of numerous busses and cars, heading from Georgia. After a two-day long standoff, the uninvited guests, who didn’t manage to break the resistance of the defenders of the town, were forced to leave their positions and go back.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Regular working meeting of the South Ossetian delegation at the GID, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, and the Co-Chairs of the Discussions, representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN took place in Tskhinval on November 16, 2017.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Upon the invitation from Alan Kasaev, Chief Editor of the newspaper “North Ossetia”, Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in the festivities, dedicated to the century anniversary of the main newspaper of the Republic.

News_Titles: Dmitry Medoev: The dialogue between the leaders of Russia and South Ossetia become an indicator of the achieved level of relations
News_Shorts:
15.11.2017 A meeting of the President of the Russian Federation Vladimir Putin and the President of the Republic of South Ossetia Anatolii Bibilov, who arrived in Moscow on an official visit upon the invitation from Russian leader, took place in Novo-Ogarevo presidential residence yesterday. According to experts, the meeting can be called a successful one.
Our edition contacted Dmitrii Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, a participant of the negotiation, and he agreed to give us a brief interview.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit of Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, to the Russian Federation negotiations with Vladimir Putin, the President of the Russian Federation, were organized on November 14, 2017.
Current terms of the South Ossetian-Russian cooperation were discussed during the meeting. 
Cooperation agreement on providing Russian citizens residing in the territory of the Republic of South Ossetia with insurance under the Russian mandatory health insurance system and delivering them medical treatment in Russian healthcare institutions was signed in presence of the two Presidents.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, continues his official visit to the Russian Federation.
Today, on November 14, President Bibilov laid a wreath to the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier in the Alexander Garden by Kremlin Wall. Members of the South Ossetian delegation participated in the ceremony. The participants observed a moment of silence in tribute to the Soviet citizens who fell in the Great Patriotic War while protecting the Motherland.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit of Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, to the Russian Federation a meeting of Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, with Mike Aroy, Deputy Foreign Minister of the Republic of Nauru, took place on November 13, 2017 in Moscow.
A range of issues of mutual interest was discussed during the meeting. In particular, strengthening cooperation through the two Foreign Ministries was on the agenda. 
Special attention was drawn to details of implementation of the agreements achieved at the meeting of President Bibilov and President Waqa, which had taken place earlier.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the official visit of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Russian Federation a meeting of Anatoliy Bibilov with Baron Divavesi Waqa, the President of the Republic of Nauru, took place in Moscow on November 13, 2017.
The Presidents exchanged opinions on the possibilities of development of the bilateral ties in specific directions, which could help in making interstate contacts more active and promote further harmonization of the two nations. Apart from that the parties had a discussion on the perspectives of cooperation between South Ossetia and Nauru at the international arena. 
The President of Nauru expressed readiness to assist the people of South Ossetia in extending international ties with those countries of the Pacific Rim, which Nauru has friendly relations with.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Upon the invitation from Vladimir Putin, the President of the Russian Federation, Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, arrived in Moscow on an official visit on November 13, 2017.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
November 6, 2017 saw Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participating in the International Forum Friends of Crimea, organized in framework of the International Conference in Yalta.
Sergey Aksenov, the Head of the Republic of Crimea, welcomed the participants and the attendees of the Forum. He voiced the welcoming message from Vladimir Putin, the President of the Russian Federation, and marked that the document emphasizes the high level and importance of the event.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, is taking part in the international conference entitled “Crimea in the International Context. Friends of Crimea”, which is being held in the Livadia Palace, Yalta on November 6-7, 2017.
Famous politicians, acting ministers, members of parliaments, public figures, representatives of cultural, business and media sectors were among the ninety delegates from thirty states, including China, Japan, Syria, Palestine, Israel, India and European countries, participating in the conference.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Alan Elbakiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Republic of South Ossetia, on October 20, 2017.
The Minister informed the Ambassador about the results of recent visits to Italy, San-Marino and Catalonia and told about meetings held at different levels, where friendly relations and joint stands of South Ossetia and Abkhazia had been emphasized.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
October 30, 2017 saw a press-conference of Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, organized in the press center of the State Committee on Information and Press.
During the news conference the Minister spoke in detail about the results of visits to the Italian Republic and the Republic of San-Marino and informed about the visit to Barcelona, where a representation office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Catalonia had been opened. 
Apart from that the Minister touched upon issues of the Foreign Ministry’s work and answered questions from journalists.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
October 23, 2017 saw the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev arriving on a short-term visit to Catalonia.
Minister Medoev met with compatriots in Catalonia, who despite the distance stay in touch with their Motherland, are interested in the affairs happening there and strive for making contribution to spreading the truth in West about the events in South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A meeting of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev with Eliseo Bertolasi and Palmarino Zoccatelli, representatives of the North League party, took place in the National Assembly of Veneto on October 22, 2017.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On October 22, 2017, at the end of the visit to Italy, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev arrived in Venice, the capital of region Veneto, where the consultative referendum on the extension of the autonomy was being held.
Veneto is one of the most economically developed regions of Italy. 
In framework of the visit a meeting of Minister Medoev with Dr. Luchano Sandona, member of the Regional Council of Veneto, responsible for the referendum from the Government, took place. Later the Minister observed the voting process.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
October 20, 2107 saw Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participating in the X Eurasian Economic Forum in Verona, Italy.
More than 1000 delegates from Russia, Italy, Azerbaijan, Armenia, Belarus, India, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, China, South Korea and European states took part in the event. 
Businessmen, political and public figures, diplomats and experts addressed the Forum. Prime Minister of Italy from 1996–1998 and 2006–2008 Romano Prodi, CEO of Rosneft Igor Sechin, former Prime Minister of Italy Silvio Berlusconi, German Chancellor from 1998–2005 Gerhard Schroeder, President of the Russian Union of Industrialists and Entrepreneurs Alexander Shokhin, Executive Vice Chairman and CEO of Pirelli & C. Marco Tronchetti Provera, President of Liguria Giovanni Toti, Mayor of Verona Federico Sboarina, State Secretary of the Union State of Russia and Belarus Grigory Rapota, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation in Italy and San Marino Sergey Razov, President of Eni Emma Marchegalia, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Belarus to Italy and Malta Alexander Guryanov and others were among the delegates.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In framework of the visit to Italy the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev visited Florence on October 19, 2017, where attended Piazzale Bambine e Bambini di Beslan, a square named after the children of Beslan, killed and injured as a result of the terror attack in September 2004.
The meeting of Minister Medoev with Professor Franco Cardini, a famous historian, also took place.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A press conference of the South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev for the Italian media was organized in Rome in the representative office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy on October 18, 2017.
A meeting with Giulietto Chiesa, a representative of the Parliament of the Republic of South Ossetia in the European Parliament, and a group of Italian friends of South Ossetia took place as well. A diplomatic passport of the Republic of South Ossetia was given to Mr. Chiesa during the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
October 17, 2017 saw a meeting of Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, with Alessandro Bevitori, Chairman of the Parliamentary Commission for Foreign Affairs, Emigration and Immigration, and a group of Parliamentarians, representatives of the left-wing Social Democrats, the majority party in the Great and General Council of the Republic of San Marino.
During the meeting a negotiation on the perspectives of establishment party-to-party and inter-parliamentary ties, as well as possibilities of the bilateral cooperation in economic and cultural spheres took place.

News_Titles: South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Interview to RIA Novosti
News_Shorts: The South Ossetian Foreign Minister stated about the necessity to extend international contacts 21:30 17.10.2017

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Within the framework of the visit of Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, to Italy, a meeting of the Minister with Alberto Drudi, the Chair of Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Pesaro -Urbino, the Head of Italian-Russian sector of the Italian Chamber of Commerce and Industry, took place on October 16, 2017.
During the meeting Minister Medoev expressed gratitude for the invitation and opportunity to get acquainted with the commercial and economic possibilities of the region. The Minister marked that South Ossetia was ready for cooperation in many different areas and would be glad to welcome Italian businessmen in the Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, is on a working visit to Italy these days.
Exhibition entitled Colors of the Caucasus was opened in the Gallery of Modern Art in Alexander Museum Palace, Pesaro on October 14, 2017. Paintings by Magrez Kelekhsaev, Lavrentiy Kasoev. Akhsar Esenov, Georgiy Gabaraev, Oleg Basiev, Vadim Pukhaev, Vadim Kadzhaev, Viktor Tsallagov, Fatima Tomaeva-Gabellini, Valeriy Ataev were exhibited at the exposition. The exhibition was organized in framework of the cultural project “The Days of Ossetia in Europe” by the European Association of the Ossetian Communities “Renaissance” and the representative office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy.

News_Titles: The message of the South Ossetian delegation for mass media
News_Shorts: Pertaining to the results of the 41st round of the Geneva International Discussions

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
October 9, 2017 saw Vitaliy Yankovskiy, the Head of the Official Representation of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, presenting a painting 08.08.08 by a famous Soviet and Pridnestrovian artist Gennadiy Zykov, which symbolizes the Georgian aggression against the people of South Ossetia, to the National Museum of the Republic of South Ossetia
Tskhinval, October 09, 2017

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Vitaliy Yankovskiy, the Head of the Official Representation of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, on October 6, 2017.
Mr. Yankovskiy reported about the work of the Representation on deepening and extending partnership conducted in accordance with the existing agreements. Consultations on a range of challenges requiring systematic coordinated solutions were held. The necessity of accelerating efforts for further development of friendly ties between South Ossetia and Pridnestrovie was emphasized.

News_Titles: Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Answers to Questions from TASS
News_Shorts:
Q: - The Catalan referendum for secession from Spain was held on October 1, 2017. What can you say about this event?
A:  - Today the Catalan citizens like we in South Ossetia in early 1990-s have been defending and fighting for the fundamental and the most often declared European value – the right of the people for self-determination. Despite the police riots, it is obvious that the Catalans have honorably asserted their right to independence! The aggressive response of Spanish authorities to the referendum once again has shown to the world that not the rule of fundamental principles of international law, but double standards and barefaced hypocrisy has become the practice in the West. Having recognized the independence of Kosovo by rejection of a part of the Serbian territory, the so-called guardians of democracy have strongly opposed self-determination of the people of South Ossetia and Abkhazia. And when the people of South Ossetia were exposed to ethnic cleansings by Georgia when they had been asserting the right to independence, nobody in the West condemned the actions of Georgia.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: September 27, 2017 saw an episode of 60 Minutes broadcast on the Russia-1 federal TV channel where one of the participants of the show was trying to draw an analogy between the situation in Ukraine, which has been developing in connection with the ban on use of Russian, and some changes which have affected teaching at schools of the Leningor region of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Upon the invitation from Vadim Potomskiy, the Governor of the Orel region, Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in the solemnities, dedicated to the 80th Anniversary of the Orel region, organized in Orel on September 27, 2017.
The festivities began at the Square of Tankers, where a wreath laying ceremony took place. The attendees paid tribute to heroes who fell for the freedom of Motherland and the liberation from the fascist occupants and laid flowers at the Monument to the Heroes, at the common grave and at the Monument to Ivan Baghramyan, Marshal of the Soviet Union, twice Hero of the Soviet Union and Freeman of the City of Orel.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the Catalan independence referendum
We in South Ossetia watch carefully the political developments in Spain, where on September 6, 2017 the Parliament of Catalonia passed the law on conducting a referendum on independence on October 1, 2017. As a democratic process, a referendum is the highest form of expression of the will of people, and the results of this significant political action are of paramount importance for the community.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetian Foreign Minister, hosted a meeting with the official delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia, which arrived in Tskhinval on the occasion of the festivities dedicated to the 27th Anniversary of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Festivities, dedicated to the 27th Anniversary of the Republic of South Ossetia are being held in South Ossetia. The proclamation of the Republic became a logical result of the aggressive Georgian policy, aimed at extirpation of the Ossetian nation, its ancient traditions and culture. This big day ushered in a new era in history of South Ossetia. According to the established tradition, the Day of the Republic is celebrated with a military parade held in South Ossetian capital.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
September 19, 2017 saw Petr Gassiev, the Chairman of the Parliament of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosting a meeting with Giulietto Chiesa, a political expert, journalist and public person, who among the Italian delegation arrived in Tskhinval to participate in the festivities, dedicated to the 27th Anniversary of the Republic of South Ossetia.
Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetian Foreign Minister participated in the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: September 19, 2017 saw Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosting a meeting with Mauro Murgia, the Representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy, who among the delegation from Italy arrived in Tskhinval to participate in the festivities, dedicated to the 27th Anniversary of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
September 18, 2017 saw a meeting of Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, with a delegation from Turkey, consisting of representatives of the Ossetian public organization “The Alans”, which arrived in Tskhinval on the occasion of the festivities, dedicated to the 27th Anniversary of the Republic of South Ossetia.
Terms of further development and strengthening humanitarian and cultural ties between South Ossetia and the Ossetian expats community in Turkey were discussed during the meeting.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The so-called territorial integrity of Georgia was again supported within the meeting of the Security and Defense Working Group of the U.S.–Georgia Strategic Partnership Commission, which was organized in the U.S. Department of State. During the meeting the U.S. representatives expressed once again the concern about the on-going borderization of the Republic of South Ossetia. Alongside with this Russia was again called on to withdraw its forces from the region.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
September 13, 2017 saw Dmitriy Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, hosting a meeting with Muraz Kozonti, a famous historian, professor at the Katyavala Bwila University in Angola, who is native of South Ossetia.
The Minister noted that we in South Ossetia are always glad to welcome the guest in his historic homeland and are proud of such a worthy representative of the Ossetian nation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with the Co-Chairs of the Geneva International Discussions, representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN, who arrived in Tskhinval on a working visit.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Working meeting of the South Ossetian delegation at the GID, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, and the Co-Chairs of the Discussions, representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN, took place in Tskhinval on September 12.

News_Titles: South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Interview to South Ossetia Newspaper
News_Shorts:
- Nine years ago diplomatic relations were established between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation. What are, in your opinion, the results of the development of South Ossetian-Russian relations over this time? What is their significance not only in framework of intergovernmental format, but in view of strengthening stability and security in the South Caucasus?
- I remember those days very well. Everything was happening in the Reception House of the Russian Foreign Ministry at 17, Spiridonovka Street. Murat Dzhioev, the Minister, arrived in Moscow with a note, where it was written that “on behalf of the Republic of South Ossetia the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia has the honor to offer establishing diplomatic relations at level of Embassies”. The answering note by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, which was announced by Minister Lavrov, contained the consent of the Russian Federation to establish diplomatic relations. Then, at the same place, in solemn surroundings the exchange of notes took place, which constituted the agreement on establishment of diplomatic relations.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On the official reception dedicated to the 9th Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation
A ceremonial reception dedicated to the 9th anniversary of establishment of diplomatic relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation, organized by South Ossetian Foreign Ministry together with the Parliamentary Committee on Foreign Policy and Inter-Parliament Communications, took place in the Garden room of the Parliament of the Republic on September 11.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
For the attention of citizens of the Republic of South Ossetia
As Dengue virus infection was registered in the Bolnisi region of Georgia in June 2017, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia warns citizens of the Republic, who have Russian citizenship, regardless of place of residence, against visiting Georgia until the officials announce about localization of the potential epidemic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
September 11 saw Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetian Foreign Minister, hosting a meeting with citizens of Israel, who arrived in Tskhinval on a fact-finding visit.
The delegates will see the sights of Tskhinval, visit monuments of Jewish community in places of compact Jewish settlement, cemetery, the synagogue and the National Museum.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The 9th anniversary of the day of establishment of diplomatic relations between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation is celebrated on September 9.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, chaired the first meeting of the new Security Council, on September 5.
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs, participated in the meeting.

News_Titles: South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Interview to Netgazeti
News_Shorts:
- Mr. Medoev, 9 years have passed since the recognition of the independence of South Ossetia by Russia. What has been done for the international recognition of South Ossetia throughout these years? What are your plans for the nearest future? 
- Indeed, August 26, 2017 saw celebration of another anniversary of the recognition of the Republic of South Ossetia by the Russian Federation. This day is very important for us. After those August days Georgia has ceased its any attempts to force us to obey Tbilisi’s will. The peace has come, and it is the main success of all that campaign. Saakashvili's regime put an end to the peaceful process on August 8, 2008. And since this date the internationally accepted term “Georgian-Ossetian conflict” has ceased to exist, as well as the associated term “settlement".

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The official delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by Igor Kozaev, the Chief of Administration of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, which was heading to Tiraspol to participate in the festivities dedicated to the 27th Anniversary of the Day of Republic of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, was denied entry to the Republic of Moldova by border guards of the Republic of Moldova on August 31.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetian Foreign Minister, participated in the celebratory assembly, which took place in Tskhinval secondary school №6 named after Eduard Bekoev, on September 1.
Dmitriy Medoev congratulated the children, parents and teachers on the Knowledge Day and wished them success in the new school year.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Georgian border guards placed at Russian-Georgian border denied entry to Georgia for Russian citizens of Ossetian origin, natives of settlement Kob, who were going to their native village to celebrate a religious holiday. Without explanation, deportation stamps, banning from entry for five years, were placed in their passports, and later, with reference to an order of a higher official, it has been cynically stated that “not a single Ossetian would ever enter the territory of village Kob”.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: A solemn assembly entitled “I couldn’t imagine myself without Russia, without its love or without my love” dedicated to the 9th Anniversary of the Day of Recognition of the Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia by the Russian Federation was organized in Tskhinval on August 26.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Vyacheslav Bitarov, the Head of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, heading the delegation of North Ossetia, which arrived in Tskhinval on the occasion of the festivities, dedicated to the Day of the Recognition of the Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia, on August 26, 2017.
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in the meeting.
The President welcomed the guests and marked that August 26 is a holiday for the whole Ossetian nation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Festivities dedicated to the 9th anniversary of the recognition of the independence of the Republic of South Ossetia by the Russian Federation are taking place in the Republic on August 26.
The correct and fateful decision taken by Dmitriy Medvedev, the President of the Russian Federation, nine years ago gave the Republic the chance for stable development, and after two decades of ethnical cleanings, which culminated in the barbarous action of the Tbilisi regime in August 2008, provided guarantees of security against other attempts of military aggression from Georgian side.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
Answer of Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetia Foreign Minister, to the question of South Ossetia Today International Information Agency
News_Shorts:
Вопрос: August 18 saw Ian Kelly, the US Ambassador to Georgia, visiting Ergneti, a Georgian village adjacent to the border with the Republic of South Ossetia, where he claimed that “occupation will not last, that barbed wire will not stand”. How can you comment on that?
Ответ: The statements of the US Ambassador made about the state border of the Republic of South Ossetia looks like the last desperate attempt of Georgian mentors to bring hope for restoration of the mythical territorial integrity of Georgia. However, that traditional performance resembled all previous prearranged actions, organized near the state border, but with one difference – this time services of the elderly grandfather were not necessary for the organizers.

News_Titles: South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Interview to Sputnik-South Ossetia IA
News_Shorts:
— Mr. Medoev, did you expect your appointment as the Minister of Foreign Affairs or in other words, was there any agreement between you and the President during the presidential campaign?
— I had no agreements either with the President or with anyone from his team. I purposefully participated in the election campaign as a member of a presidential candidate’s team. Positions and career were the least of my concerns – one had to be result-orientated and thus we gained a fair and merited success. It was a natural decision for me, as there is no secret that yet in 2011 I supported this candidate and even today I believe that unless the famous events disrupt the electors’ choice, it would have been Anatoliy Bibilolov, who would have become the President. Neither before, nor later have I changed my political orientation. I have always considered upholding national interests as the main thing in my work.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
August 12, 2017 saw a meeting Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Vyacheslav Bitarov, the Head of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, with the participants of Ethnolager 2017, a summer cultural and educational course, organized in framework of the international project “Trace of the Alans”. Dmitriy Medoev, the South Ossetian Foreign Minister, participated in the meeting, which was organized in the village of Nar.
The leaders of the Republics welcomed the guests. 
In particular Anatoliy Bibilov noted that he is pleased to see the descendants of the Alans in their homeland.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Commemoration events, dedicated to the 9th anniversary of Georgian military aggression against the Republic of South Ossetia, were organized in Italy on August 8, 2017.
The attendees who came to Piazza Collenuccio in Pesaro observed a minute of silence in tribute to the memory of numerous victims of the Georgian aggression. 
As Mauro Murgia, the Representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy, marked, “Today we have been looking back to the tragedy of the people of South Ossetia, which happened nine years ago, when the world became evident of the unprecedented cruelty and cynicism, shown by the fascist Georgian regime”.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Commemoration events, dedicated to the 9th anniversary of Georgian military aggression against the Republic of South Ossetia, are being hold in the Republic on August 7-8.
The tragic events, which happened nine years ago, will remain an open wound in the heart of the Ossetian people. 
During the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games in Beijing in August 2008, Georgia has brought down the power of its military vehicle on South Ossetia. The treacherous attack of Georgia against South Ossetia became not only a violation of the fundamental principles of international law, but also a demonstration of complete disregard of the norms of a civilized society.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Large-scale joint military exercises of NATO and partners of the Alliance Noble Partner 2017, which are characterized by an unprecedented increase in the military potential involved, started in Georgia for the third time on July 30, 2017.

News_Titles: Responces of Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetian Foreign Minister, to questions of South Ossetia Today International Information Agency
News_Shorts:
- Could you, please, be more precise about official and working visits of the President? What is their purpose, and what agreements have been concluded? 
- The primary role in foreign policy implementation is played by the President. As earlier, further development and strengthening of the strategic partnership with the Russian Federation is the top priority of our foreign policy.

News_Titles: President of the Republic of South Ossetia Anatoliy Bibilov met with Patriarch of Moscow and all Russia Cyril
News_Shorts:
Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, met with Cyrill, the Patriarch of Moscow and all Russia.
In his welcoming speech the Primate of the Russian Orthodox Church expressed confidence that the work of Anatoliy Bibilov at the high post would promote consolidation of the society and wished to discuss religious issues and hear the opinion of the President on the situation in South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On July 24, 2017 Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Mauro Murgia, the Representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy, Francesca Matacena, director of the Conservatory of Pesaro, and Rosanna Pezzolesi, secretary of the Conservatory, who had arrived in Tskhinval on a working visit.
Issues, related to work of the representative office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in Italy were discussed during the meeting. The parties exchanged opinion on the perspectives of various projects, which could be implemented in the Republic in economic, educational and cultural spheres.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Diplomats from the CIS countries, Abkhazia and South Ossetia are participating in the Fourth Forum of Young Diplomats, which takes place on July 20-21 in Moscow. Officers of the South Ossetian Foreign Ministry represent the Republic.
The general topic of the Forum is “Information Technologies in Modern Diplomacy”. 
Young diplomats from Abkhazia, Armenia, Belarus, Kyrgyzstan, Moldavia, Tadjikistan and Uzbekistan take part in work of the Forum.

News_Titles: South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev’s Answer to Media
News_Shorts:
Q: Today Presidents of Georgia and Ukraine have visited the state border of the Republic of South Ossetia with Georgia. What are your comments on this fact?
A:  It recently has become a bad tradition for Georgian authorities to organize provocative ceremonial excursions to the state border between South Ossetia and Georgia for their guests. Poroshenko was no exception and was shown a great honor – he participated in another border theatrics, claiming that he had arrived to testify “the territorial integrity” of Georgia.

News_Titles: Tskhinval welcomes any efforts aimed at establishment of peace in Donbass
News_Shorts: МОСКВА, 18 июл — РИА Новости. Tskhinval welcomes any steps aimed at settlement of the conflict in Donbass, stated South Ossetian Foreign Minister Dmitriy Medoev in his comment to RIA Novosti, made on the suggestion of Alexander Zakharchenko, the Head of self-declared Donetsk People’s Republic, to establish the state of Malorossiya.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Commemoration events, dedicated to the Day of Peacekeepers are taking place in the capital of South Ossetia on July 14. 25 years have passed since the significant event in the recent history of South Ossetian people – bringing peacekeeping forces to the area of Georgian-Ossetian conflict. It had been done in accordance with General provisions of the Agreement on Principles of Settlement of the Georgian - Ossetian Conflict, signed by Heads of Russia, Georgia, North Ossetia and South Ossetia on June 14, 1992 in Sochi. The dividing line which became a buffer zone between the warring parties has been established.

News_Titles: Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetian Foreign Minister’s speech in South Ossetian State University
News_Shorts: Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in the round table entitled “NATO Enlargement across the World: Accession of Montenegro and Further Threats”, which was organized in South Ossetian State University on July 12. The Minister emphasized the role of South Ossetia in the system of global military-political relations. In particular, Minister Medoev reminded the attendees that “We are a part of the ocean where the interests of NATO member states intersect with interests of Eastern and Southern states and Russia. South Ossetia is located at the crossroads of military and political influences and trends of NATO, and therefore we can not afford to be relaxed”.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the meeting of Dmitry Medoev and Sergey Lavrov, Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation 
On the invitation from Foreign Minister Lavrov, Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetian Foreign Minister, arrived in Moscow on a working visit on July 9.
The meeting of the Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation was held in the Reception House of the MFA of Russia.

News_Titles: Message of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
July 7-8 saw the official visit of Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, to the Republic of Abkhazia.
Dmitriy Medoev, Foreign Minister, Uruzmag Dzhagaev, Prosecutor General, Viktor Shargaev, Head of KGB, Zhanna Zasseeva, Minister of Culture, Oleg Botsiev, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Republic of Abkhazia, Anatoliy Dzhidzhoev, Chair of the Public Chamber of the Republic of South Ossetia, were members of the presidential delegation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Daur Kove, Abkhazian Foreign Minister, signed the Plan of Consultations between the Ministries of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia and Abkhazia for 2017-2018 on July 7.
The Plan will promote foreign policy coordination between the two Republics.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia to South Ossetia International Information Agency
News_Shorts:
Q: A propaganda campaign connected with the work on the designation of the line of the state border between the Republic of South Ossetia and Georgia has been launched in Georgia. As they say in Tbilisi, this line was moved deeper into the territory of the neighboring state, and residents of the areas of Georgia bordering with South Ossetia lost their agriculturally used land. How would you comment on this?
A: This campaign is just another blatant provocation, fabricated without rhyme or reason. Similar hysterics of the official Tbilisi, normally arranged to some events, in this case to the next meeting in the Karasin-Abashidze format, have already become traditional and surprise particularly nobody. It should be noted that such actions were resorted to in Tbilisi too often.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Official meeting of Dmitriy Medoev and Daur Kove, Foreign Ministers of the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Abkhazia correspondingly, took place in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia on July 5.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, received credentials from Marat Kulakhmetov, the newly appointed Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation in the Republic of South Ossetia, on July 3.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Marat Kulakhmetov, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation in the Republic of South Ossetia, on July 3.
A ceremony of credential letters presentation by the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation Marat Kulakhmetov to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitry Medoev took place.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Andrey Tskhovrebov, the First Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in a ceremony of solemn cancellation of stamps (edition - “Churches”), issued on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of recognition of the Donetsk People’s Republic by the Republic of South Ossetia, on June 27.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the 25th Anniversary of the Agreement on Principles of Settlement of the Georgian - Ossetian Conflict signed in Sochi

June 24 will see the 25th anniversary of the historical event – signing of Sochi Agreements on the Principles of Settlement of Georgian-Ossetian Conflict.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Farrukh Islomov, Head of the Representation of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) in South Ossetia, on June 22.
In the course of the conversation, issues related to the full range of activities of the ICRC Representative Office in South Ossetia were discussed. The Head of the Representation of the ICRC's Office informed the Minister about the most significant areas of work including humanitarian problems and plans for the near future.

News_Titles: Joint statement of South Ossetian and Abkhazian delegations on the Geneva International Discussions on security and stability in Transcaucasia
News_Shorts: The UN General Assembly has been accepting draft resolution on refugees and displaced persons from South Ossetia and Abkhazia prepared by Georgian party for several years already. Delivering again and again the same writing of the document Georgia tries to impose on international community a unilateral politicized corrupt vision of the problem of refugees to support their non-legitimate territorial claims.

News_Titles: The message of South Ossetia delegation for mass media
News_Shorts: Pertaining to the results of the 40th round of the Geneva International Discussions

News_Titles: Pertaining to the mourning ceremony in honor of the 13 Communards
News_Shorts: A mourning meeting dedicated to the 97th anniversary of one of the bloodiest dates in the Ossetian history – the Execution of 13 Communards in 1920, took place in South Ossetia on June 20. To pay tribute to the heroes who sacrificed their lives for freedom of the Ossetian people, Analotliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic, Erik Pukhaev, the Prime Minister, Petr Gassiev, the Speaker of the Parliament, cabinet ministers, members of the parliament, public members came to the memorial at the Hill of Zguder.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Magomed Shamilov, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Dagestan in the Republic of South Ossetia, on June 19.
The parties exchanged opinion on current issues of bilateral cooperation between South Ossetia and the republics of Northern Caucasus and further development of traditionally friendly Ossetian-Dagestan relations, including building humanitarian, cultural, trade and economic relations.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On the occasion of the 25th Anniversary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, a ceremonial reception on behalf of South Ossetian Foreign Ministry was organized on June 13. Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic, Erik Pukhaev, the Prime Minister, Petr Gassiev, the Speaker of the Parliament, Elbrus Kargiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation, Alan Elbakiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia, Egor Kochiev, the Head of Diplomatic Mission of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of South Ossetia, and other officials participated in the event.
Dmitry Medoev, the Head of Foreign Policy Agency, was welcoming the guests. In his opening speech he noted that established 25 years ago, the diplomatic service of the Republic from its first days of working in hard conditions has been participating actively both in internal and foreign politics.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On the occasion of the 25th Anniversary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, decorated veterans and employees of the Ministry with National Awards of the Republic on June 13.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
June 7, 2017 saw Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetia Foreign Minister, hosting a meeting with Dusan Ignjatovic, an independent international expert, who since 2015, upon the OSCE invitation has been participating in search of South Ossetian citizens, unaccounted for as a result of Georgian aggression.
Issues related to the work conducted by Mr. Ignjatovic in clarifying the destiny of the missing people and the expert’s further activity were discussed during the meeting.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Resolution on “Status of internally displaced persons and refugees from Abkhazia, Georgia and the Tskhinvali region/South Ossetia, Georgia” submitted by Georgia, has for the 9th time been adopted on the 71st session of the UN General Assembly on June 1, 2017.
Unfortunately, the contents of the document again fails to describe true problems of people, who suffered of several military aggressions form Georgia against its neighboring states and proceeding territorial claims to the Republic of South Ossetia and the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: “The Days of Ossetian Culture” which are annually organized by Association “Renaissance Sandidzan”, headed by Radion Pukhaev, have been taking place in Brussels these days. Alan Kochiev, Deputy Foreign Minister of the Republic of South Ossetia, participated in the solemn opening ceremony. On behalf of Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic, and Dmitriy Medoev, South Ossetia Foreign Minister, he welcomed the attendees.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with applicants, recommended by the MFA of the Republic for enrolment to the Diplomatic Academy of Russian Foreign Ministry, on June 2, 2017.
The Minister spoke in detail about the conditions and education process in the prestigious institution of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, gave explicit answers to questions from the applicants and assured them that the Ministry would carefully follow the achievements of the students studying foreign policy in the Russian Federation.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Egor Kochiev, Head of Diplomatic Mission of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of South Ossetia, on June 2, 2017.
Further development of friendly relations between the two Republics became subject of discussion, which run in a confident, warm and constructive atmosphere.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
A delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia, headed by President Bibilov, is participating in the SPIEF-2017 (St. Petersburg International Economic Forum).
Aza Khabalova, the Minister of Finance of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Znaur Gassiev, the Ambassador Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Russian Federation, are members of the delegation of the Republic.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Dmitriy Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Alan Elbakiev, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Republic of South Ossetia.
In his welcoming speech Minister Medoev noted the traditionally friendly interstate relations between South Ossetia and Abkhazia and the open and confident dialogue with Abkhazian foreign-policy partners.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the 25th Anniversary of the Act of Declaration of Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia

Against the background of escalation of the armed aggression of Georgia against the people of South Ossetia and bloody fighting, a session of the Supreme Soviet of the Republic of South Ossetia took place in Tskhinval on May 28-29, 1992 where the Act of Declaration of Independence of South Ossetia was adopted.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the appointment of a Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia

Under the President Decree dated May 25, 2017 Dmitriy Medoev was appointed as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia.
Biographic reference:

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: May 20 is annually celebrated in South Ossetia as the Commemoration day of victims of Georgian aggression. 25 years ago the roundabout way nearby Ossetian village Zar became a scene of the atrocity committed by armed forces of Georgia. Refugees driving in a column their way from South to North Ossetia were shot down at point-blank range from an ambush. 33 persons, mostly children, women and elderly, were killed as a result of that barbarous action; about 20 persons were badly wounded.

News_Titles: Comment by representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The scandal which has burst in Georgia after the visit of the Co-chairs of the Geneva International Discussions to Tskhinval can only cause bewilderment and again disappointment with the priorities, Georgian policy in relation to South Ossetia is based on. This time the inexplicable overreaction of Tbilisi was caused by words of congratulation on the occasion of inauguration expressed by Mr. Herbert Zalber, the Co-chair of the GID representing the EU, at the meeting with Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Working meeting of South Ossetia delegation at the GID, headed by Murat Dzhioev, the Acting Foreign Minister and the Plenipotentiary of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement, and the Co-Chairs of the Discussions, representing the EU, the OSCE and the UN, who arrived to the Republic in anticipation of a regular round of the Discussions, took place in Tskhinval on May 16.
The agenda of the coming round scheduled for June 20-21, including the key objective of the Discussions – elaboration of a bilateral legally binding agreement between Georgia and South Ossetia on non-use of force, was discussed through the meeting.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
The official delegation of the Republic of South Ossetia headed by the President Anatoliy Bibilov arrived in Donetsk on May 10 to participate in festivities dedicated to the 3rd anniversary of the proclamation of the Donetsk People's Republic.
May 11 saw Anatoliy Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia, and Alexander Zakharchenko, the President of the Donetsk People's Republic, signing the Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Donetsk People's Republic.
In particular, the Treaty provides for further development of relations in political, economic, social, cultural and other spheres of mutual interest.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: It became known that on May 3 the Committee of Ministers of the Council of Europe (CMCE) made a decision concerning the agenda “the Council of Europe and the Conflict in Georgia” which in fact borders on the absurd. According to that decision, Russia at once became a party in Georgian-South Ossetian conflict and for that reason has to bear international legal responsibility for the excesses which allegedly happen on the ground. Besides, the U.S.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
May 3 saw Murat Dzhioev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosting a meeting with Julien Columeau, Head of Protection Department of the ICRC Representation in the Republic of South Ossetia, whose mission in Tskhinval is terminating.
The Minister thanked Mr.Kolumo for contribution to fruitful work of the Representation on territory of the Republic and wished him success in further activities.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Murat Dzhioev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia, hosted a meeting with Alba Azucena Torres Mejia, the First Secretary of the Embassy of Nicaragua in the Republic of South Ossetia, who arrived in Tskhinval on the occasion of inauguration of Anatoliy Bibilov, the president elect of the Republic of South Ossetia, on April 21.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: April 21 saw Murat Dzhioev, South Ossetia Foreign Minister, hosting a meeting with a delegation of the Nagorno-Karabakh Republic, headed by Karen Mirzoyan, the Minister of Foreign Affairs. Semen Afiyan, the NKR MFA Secretary General, was also among the delegates who arrived in Tskhinval on the occasion of inauguration of Anatoliy Bibilov, the president elect of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Murat Dzhioev, South Ossetia Foreign Minister, hosted a meeting with Natalya Nikonorova, Foreign Minister of the Donetsk People`s Republic, who was on an official delegation of the Republic which arrived in Tskhinval on the occasion of inauguration of Anatoliy Bibilov, the president elect of the Republic of South Ossetia, on April 21.

News_Titles: Press release of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Pertaining to the Resolution on Cooperation with Georgia adopted by the United Nations Human Rights Council 

March 24 saw the United Nations Human Rights Council adopting the Resolution on Cooperation with Georgia at the 34th session held in Geneva, where absolutely groundless alarm was expressed about “human rights and humanitarian situation in South Ossetia” as well as about ban on international observers entering the territory of the Republic. The document was prepared and submitted by Georgia.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: We paid attention to statements made by a representative of the UN Secretary General in which regrets are expressed about presidential elections and the referendum on resumption of the historic name “the State of Alania”, which from now on would be used alongside with the existing name of the state, that took place in the Republic of South Ossetia. The UN considers it as unilateral actions that could affect negatively regional security and undermine the GID.

News_Titles: Message from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
