News_Shorts: On 22 June 2011 Regional Court of Dzau delivered judgment on administrative exclusion of ten citizens of Georgia which on 18 and 19 June of the current year were detained by the South Ossetia frontiers not far from the village Koz of Dzau Region, Republic of South Ossetia, for illegal crossing of the state border between the Republic of South Ossetia and Georgia. Today these individuals were expelled to Georgia.

News_Titles: Declaration of the Genocide of 1920 in South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Under all internationally recognized norms extermination of individual population groups on racial, national, ethnic or religious grounds as well as creating living conditions calculated to bring about destruction, in whole or in part, of these groups or imposing on the groups measures intended to prevent births within the groups, is considered as one of the most heinous crimes against humanity and is defined as genocide.

News_Titles: The answers of the Republic of South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Kuzmich Jioev to the Questions of Radio Station ‘Golos Rossii’.
News_Shorts: A number of bilateral agreements between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Russian Federation were concluded. What is their effect?

News_Titles: The Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia on the Violation of the State Boundary Regime of the RSO
News_Shorts: On 18 and 19 June, 2011 ten citizens of Georgia having violated the state border between the Republic of South Ossetia and Georgia were detained in Dzau Region of the Republic of South Ossetia not far from the village Koz. At present relevant South Ossetian services carry out an investigative action with the detainees upon completion of which case papers will reach the trial.

News_Titles: The Information of the Republic of South Ossetia Ministry of Foreign Affairs about the Appointment of Narim Kozaev an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuelа
News_Shorts:
On 31 May, 2011 by the Decree of President of the Republic of South Ossetia E. Kokoity President Counsellor of State of RSO Narim Zakharovich Kozaev is appointed an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela. 
Brief biographic reference:
 Narim Zakharovich Kozaev was born on 24 February, 1965 in town Tskhinval. He got education in Gorsky Agricultural Institute in town Vladikavkaz in 1982-1988; since 2009 he has been a student of Diplomatic Academy of MFA in RF. He has state awards of RSO. 
14 June, 2011
Tskhinval

News_Titles: The Statement the Republic of South Ossetia at Geneva Talks
News_Shorts: After the war in August of 2008 for several weeks after hostilities were suspended in the zone attached to the state boundary between the Republic of South Ossetia and Georgia seven innocent civilians, citizens of South Ossetia were missed. Among the missing Ossetian citizens were under age children.

News_Titles: The Interview of Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Jioev to the State Television and Radio Company ‘IR’ on the occasion of South Ossetia Diplomacy Day
News_Shorts: Tomorrow on 28 May by tradition South Ossetia Diplomacy Day is marked in the Republic of South Ossetia. The appearance of this remarkable day is connected with the fact that on 28 May 1992 the first Government of the RSO was formed at the session of Supreme Soviet of the Republic of South Ossetia. And the Ministry of Foreign Relationships was a part of it. The Ministry of Foreign Relationships was a prototype of present-day Ministry of Foreign Affairs. By tradition we have been marking South Ossetia Diplomacy Day since then.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in connection with the 19th anniversary of Zar tragedy
News_Shorts:
Today on May 20, 2011 in the Republic of South Ossetia are taking place memorial events dedicated to 19th anniversary of Zar tragic event. 
19 years ago, on May 20, 1992 at the height of Georgian aggression against South Ossetia, at the Zar bypass road, the only way from beleaguered Tskhinval to safe Vladikavkaz, Georgian gunmen fusilladed point-blank transport column with peaceful Ossetian citizens. 34 people including women, elderly persons and children died, 16 people were wounded. The eldest victim was 73, the youngest – 12 years old.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in connection with the incident at the state border with Georgia
News_Shorts:
According to report of KGB of the Republic of South Ossetia on May 18, 2011 at the state border with Georgia duty detail of KGB border service detected a cluster of citizens of Georgia in the vicinity of Lopan village who violated the border of the Republic.
During the detention South Ossetian duty detail was fired with light arms. By return fire assailants were dispersed and escaped to the territory of Georgia.

News_Titles: The Announcement the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On 13-14 May 2011, the Republic of South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Kuzmich paid a working visit to the Republic of Abkhazia . 
In the course of the visit meetings with Abkhazian Prime-Minister S.M.Shamba and Minister of Foreign Affairs M.Kh.Gvinjia took place. They discussed the question of further development of the bilateral relations and in particular the development of the contractual and legal foundation of the collaboration
М.К. Jioev paid his respect to the first President of the Republic of Abkhazia Vladislav Ardzinba and laid flowers at his grave.

News_Titles: The Announcement the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On 11 May 2011, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Jioev M.K. received the Head of the Office of the International Committee of the Red Cross in RSO Piere Raichel. 
They discussed questions concerning the activities of the Red Cross on the territory of RSO. In particular, they touched upon the subject of three-sided meetings on the search of the missing people. 
The Head of the Red Cross informed Jioev M.K. about the completion of the agricultural project on seeds distribution in rural areas of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia about the working visit of the Russian Federation Minister of Foreign Affairs S. V. Lavrov to the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On 25 of April the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Russian Federation S. V. Lavrov visited the Republic of South Ossetia. Within the Framework of visit eventuated meetings with the President of RSO E. D. Kokoity and the Minister of Foreign Affairs M. K. Dzhioev.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia about the working visit of the Russian Federation Minister of Foreign Affairs S. V. Lavrov to the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On 25 of April the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Russian Federation S. V. Lavrov visited the Republic of South Ossetia. Within the Framework of visit eventuated meetings with the President of RSO E. D. Kokoity and the Minister of Foreign Affairs M. K. Dzhioev.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia apropos of the statement of NATO-Georgia commission
News_Shorts: On April 15, 2011 at the session of NATO-Georgia commission in Berlin was adopted common statement expressing support of sovereignty and territorial integrity of Georgia and necessity of international monitoring at its territory “including South Ossetia and Abkhazia”.

News_Titles: Awarding of diplomatic ranks
News_Shorts:
On 21 April 2011 by Decree of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia E.D. Kokoity first deputy Foreign Minister of RSO Pliev Alan Soltanovich and deputy Foreign Minister of RSO Tskhovrebov Kazbulat Inalovich were awarded by diplomatic ranks “Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Envoy”.
Press bureau of
RSO MFA

News_Titles: Greeting Message of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Nagorno Karabakh G. Petrosyan to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dzhioev M.K.
News_Shorts:
Dear Murat Dzhioev,
Heartily congratulate You with the adoption of the Constitution of the Republic of South Ossetia!
The 8th of April 2011 became the important period in modern history of RSO.
This day was adopted the Basic Law of the Republic of South Ossetia as a state, proclaimed by its high value personal rights and freedoms of the people, and its primary obligation - protection of these values. Sure, that each year this celebration day will add to the people of fraternal South Ossetia enthusiasm, joy and confidence in future.

News_Titles: Commentary of press-bureau of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in connection with the statement of state minister of Georgia on reintegration
News_Shorts: State minister of Georgia on reintegration Ekaterina Tkeshelashvili at the hearings in Georgian parliament on April 15 2011 proposed to issue to citizens of South Ossetia and Abkhazia “neutral” passports without Georgian symbology what ostensibly let their owners to go abroad and to learn there at the expense of fund of president of Georgia.

News_Titles: The Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Osetia in connection with the Constitution Day of RSO
News_Shorts: On the 8th of April 2011 in South Ossetia is celebrated the Constitution Day in the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: The Statement of the Ministry of Forieghn Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia about the session of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe
News_Shorts:
Оn 11-15 April 2011 in Strasburg will start the spring session of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe (PAСE), where among other subjects is planned to discuss Georgia’s commitments observance as a member of this authoritative international organization.
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia draws attention of the members of PAСE to the fact that Georgia demonstratively continues ignoring the undertaken international obligations, implementation of which was a condition of the acceptance of this country to the Council of Europe.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On 25 March Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Dzhioev received Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela to the Republic of South Ossetia Ugo Khose Garsija Ernandes based in Moscow.
During the meeting the issues of bilateral cooperation between the Republic of South Ossetia and the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela were discussed as well as the prospects of further development of relations between the two states.

News_Titles: The Answer of the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the RSO Kazbulat Tskhovrebov to the Question of the Information Agency “Res”
News_Shorts: Question: There is information on ‘Wikileakes’ site confirming that it was President of Georgia M. Saakashvily who unleashed hostilities in August 2008. But at the same time the authorities of Georgia keep on accusing Russia of military aggression against Georgia and consider South Ossetia to be an occupied territory. Your commentary.

News_Titles: Information of RSO Foreign Ministry in connection with the 20-th anniversary of Ered tragedy
News_Shorts: On 18 of March 2011 in the Republic of South Ossetia passed a memorable events dedicated to 20-th anniversary of chocking tragedy happened in the vicinity of Ered village.

News_Titles: Greeting telegram to Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts:
South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Jioev sent a greeting telegram to Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Sergey Mironovich Shamba in connection with his jubilee. 
The telegram says in particular:
“I testify to You the assurance of my unfailing respect, and I am given an honor in the name of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and personally from myself to pass You sincere anniversary greetings.

News_Titles: The Report of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia on the Geneva Talks - 15 on Security in Transcaucasia
News_Shorts: The recurrent fifteenth round of Geneva talks on security in Transcaucasia was held on 4 March 2011. The delegations from the Republic of South Ossetia, the Republic of Abkhazia, the Russian Federation and Georgia under the auspices of the EU, OSCE and UN participated there. .

News_Titles: The Answer of the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the RSO Kazbulat Tskhovrebov to the Question of the Information Agency “Res”
News_Shorts: Question: There is information on ‘Wikileakes’ site confirming that it was President of Georgia M. Saakashvily who unleashed hostilities in August 2008. But at the same time the authorities of Georgia keep on accusing Russia of military aggression against Georgia and consider South Ossetia to be an occupied territory. Your commentary.

News_Titles: RSO MFA: Drugs penetrated to RSO from Georgia
News_Shorts: Georgia used to be a big problem for South Ossetia in a view of drugs supply at South Ossetia’s territory. That was disclosed to IA “Res” by the deputy Foreign Minister of South Ossetia Alan Pliev who was commenting a number of reports in electronic mass media of existing in US State Department assumptions about possible trafficking through the territory of South Ossetia and Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Commentary of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Dzhioev to IA "Res" on the decision of European court on human rights of rejection of claims against Georgia
News_Shorts: Decision of European court of rejection of citizens of the Republic of South Ossetia and relatives of Russian peacekeepers claims against Georgia is an unfair act and confirmation of unbiased attitude of this honorable European organization towards human rights.

News_Titles: Meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia M. Dzhioev with the Director of RF MFA Department on social work with compatriots abroad A. Tchepurin
News_Shorts: On 18 of February eventuated a meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia M. Dzhioev and the State adviser of RSO President on links with social unions K. Dzugaev with the Director of RF MFA Department on social work with compatriots abroad A. Tchepurin, who came to the Republic of South Ossetia with a working visit.

News_Titles: Greetings of the Republic of South Ossetia Ministry of Foreign Affairs to the Sahara Arab Democratic Republic on the occasion of 35 anniversary of the Declaration of Independence Day of SADR
News_Shorts: The Republic of Ossetia Ministry of Foreign Affairs testifies the assurance of its highest respect to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Sahara Arab Democratic Republic and is given an honor to direct to the Ministry heartfelt greetings on the occasion of 35 anniversary of the Declaration of Independence Day of SADR.

News_Titles: Congratulation telegram to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Finance of the Republic of Nauru
News_Shorts:
The Minister of RSO Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev addressed a congratulation telegram to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Finance of the Republic of Nauru Kieren Keke on the occasion of Independence Day of the Republic of Nauru. 
“Presenting my highest consideration to You I have the honour to direct You worm congratulations on the occasion of Independence Day of the Republic of Nauru.

News_Titles: Information of the press-bureau of the Foreign Ministry of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On February 16, 2011 Plenipotentiary Representative of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on post-conflict settlement B. E. Chochiev and the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia M. K. Dzhioev played host for Co-chairmen of Geneva Discussions on security in South Caucasus. 
In the course of the meeting were discussed issues related to preparation and conducting of another round of Geneva discussions, appointed at 4 March 2011.

News_Titles: The commentary of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of RSO M. Dzhioev to the State Radio and TV Company “Ir” concerning Saakashvili statement
News_Shorts: The President of Georgia Saakashvili during a live televised address on PIK channel Tuesday made statements that are completely controversial to his previous statement at European Parliament that Georgia will not resort to military force against Abkhazia and South Ossetia. He said “we are in state of war” and that’s why I believe that Saakashvili has rejected himself the recent statement that Georgia will not use force against South Ossetia and Abkhazia. This should be a lesson for those who rely on this statement.

News_Titles: Comment of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia is showing its concern over M. Saakashvily` s statement which he made on January 25th of this year on live broadcasting channel PIK (First Informational Caucasian).

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
With deep pain perceived the people of South Ossetia the news of terrorist act committed at the “Domodedovo” airport in Moscow on 24 January 2011which caused multiple human casualties. 
There is no and should not be any justification for such bloody actions leading to the downfall and suffering of guiltless people.

News_Titles: the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia received the Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On 18 of January the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev received the Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Republic of South Ossetia Nodar Pliev

News_Titles: The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev took part in the solemn event devoted to the Day of Public Prosecutor's Office
News_Shorts:
The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev took part in the solemn event devoted to the Day of Public Prosecutor's Office. 
The celebration of the professional day of Public Prosecutor’s Office servicemen eventuated in apartments newly built after war 2008 for the Public Prosecutor’s Office staff. 
South Ossetian Public Prosecutor’s Office have done a lot for the reinforcement of law and order.

News_Titles: Meeting of RSO Foreign Minister with the Head of Official Diplomatic Mission of TMR
News_Shorts:
On 14 of January the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev played host to the Head of Official Diplomatic Mission of Transdnistrian Moldovan Republic to the Republic of South Ossetia A. Pykhaev.
During the meeting were discussed questions of bilateral cooperation between the Republic of South Ossetia and Transdnistrian Moldovan Republic and the perspectives of further development of relations between two states.
Tskhinval
January 14, 2011

News_Titles: Statement of the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs on the Withdrawal of the Russian Border Post from Perevi Village on the Border between Georgia and the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
Acting in a spirit of goodwill, the Russian side has relocated deep into South Ossetia the border post that was for two years in disputed territory near the village of Perevi (western border of South Ossetia with Georgia). 
This was preceded by serious preparation. Under the auspices of Russia’s FSB Border Service, a 10-plus km bypass road had been built in difficult mountain terrain to connect the Karzmanskoye Gorge to the rest of South Ossetia. It is important in supplying the local Ossetian population.

News_Titles: The Greeting Telegram to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Nicaragua on the occasion of the Independence Day
News_Shorts: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia testifies its esteem to the Republic of Nicaragua Minister for Foreign Affairs and has an honor to send sincere greetings on the occasion of the Independence Day.

News_Titles: Greeting Telegram of the Transdniestria Moldavian Republic Minister for Foreign Affairs Vladimir Yastrebchak to South Ossetia Minister for Foreign Affairs Murat Jioev on the Occasion of the National Holiday of the of South Ossetia – the Day of Republic
News_Shorts:
The Transdniestria Moldavian Republic Minister for Foreign Affairs Vladimir Yastrebchak sent a greeting telegram to South Ossetia Minister for Foreign Affairs Murat Jioev on the occasion of the national holiday in the Republic of South Ossetia– the Day of the Republic. 
The telegram says in particular:
“I send the warmest greetings on the occasion of the main national holiday- the Day of the Republic.

News_Titles: Greeting Telegram of the Republic of Nagorno-Karabakh Minister for Foreign Affairs Georgi Petrosyan to South Ossetia Minister for Foreign Affairs Murat Jioev on the Occasion of the National Holiday – the Day of the Republic
News_Shorts:
The Republic of Nagorno-Karabakh Minister for Foreign Affairs Georgi Petrosyan sent a greeting telegram to South Ossetia Minister for Foreign Affairs Murat Jioev on the occasion of the national holiday in the Republic of South Ossetia– the Day of the Republic. 
The telegram says in particular:

News_Titles: Greeting Telegram of the Republic of Abkhazia Minister for Foreign Affairs Maksim Gvindzhia to South Ossetia Minister for Foreign Affairs Murat Jioev on the Occasion of the National Holiday - the Day of the Republic
News_Shorts:
The Minister for Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia sent a greeting telegram to South Ossetia Minister for Foreign Affairs Murat Jioev on the occasion of the national holiday of the Republic of South Ossetia - the Day of the Republic.
The telegram says in particular:
Let me testify to You the assurance of my highest respect, and send the warmest and the most sincere greetings on the occasion of the celebration of the 20th anniversary of the South Ossetia Day of Independence!

News_Titles: Greeting telegram of the Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of the Republic of South Ossetia in Russian Federation Dmitry Medoev to the South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev on the occasion of the Day of the Republic
News_Shorts:
Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of the Republic of South Ossetia in Russian Federation Dmitry Medoev sent a greeting telegram to South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev on the occasion of the national holiday of the Republic of South Ossetia- the Day of the Republic. 
The telegram says in particular:
“I testify the deepest respect and consider it an honor to send you greetings in connection with the National holiday – the Day of the Republic.

News_Titles: Greeting Telegram of the Head of the Official Representative Office (Embassy) of the South Ossetia in the Transdniestria Sergei Surago to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of South Ossetia Murat Dzhioev on the occasion of the Day of Republic
News_Shorts:
The Head of the Official Representative Office (Embassy) of the Republic of South Ossetia in the Transdniestria Moldavian Republic Sergei Surago sent a greeting telegram to South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev on the occasion of the national holiday of the Republic of South Ossetia - the Day of the Republic.
The telegram says in particular:

News_Titles: Greeting telegram of the Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of the Republic of Nicaragua in the South Ossetia Luis Alberto Molina Kuadra to South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev on the occasion of the Day of the Republic
News_Shorts:
The Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary Ambassador of the Republic of Nicaragua in the Republic of South Ossetia Luis Alberto Molina Kuadra sent a greeting telegram to South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev on the occasion of the national holiday of the Republic of South Ossetia - the Day of the Republic.
The telegram says in particular:

News_Titles: Meetings in support of South Ossetia are being held in Europe
News_Shorts:
Meetings in support of South Ossetia organized by the International Association of Ossetian Communities “Renaissance” are being held in several European capitals today.
The Actions were held in Berlin, Strasbourg and Brussels as Commissioner of the President of the Republic of South Ossetia on human rights David Sanakoev informed IA “Res”.
“Participants of the Meetings gathered in front of the building of the Council of Europe and European Commission Offices with slogans condemning Georgian aggression and calling for free Ossetian prisoners from Georgian jails” – he told.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia in connection with the second anniversary of armed aggression of Georgia against the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On August 7-8, 2010 memorial events dedicated to the second anniversary of atrocious aggression of Georgia against South Ossetia are holding.

News_Titles: Information of the Press-Bureau of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On 7-8 August in the Republic of South Ossetia were held mournful events dedicated to the second anniversary of armed aggression of Georgia against the Republic of South Ossetia. 
On 7 August at 23:35 in Tskhinval an action “Alive Light of Memory” was held and a requiem concert took place in which musicians from South and North Ossetia as well as the Moscow Rakhmaninov symphony orchestra took part. Leadership of the Republic headed by the President Eduard Kokoity attended the action.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On 4 August, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dzhioev Murat played host for the Head of ICRC Mission in the Republic of South Ossetia Reichel Pierre. At the meeting they talked of the ICRC activities in South Ossetia. Particularly the subject of cooperation in resolving the issues of water supply of the villages of the Republic of South Ossetia was touched upon. The ICRC plans for next year were discussed as well. 
Tskhinval
04.08.2010

News_Titles: The Answers of the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Kazbulat Tskhovrebov to the Questions of “Golos Rossii” Radio Broadcasting Station
News_Shorts: Question: How do you estimate the decision of the International UN Court pertaining the Kosovo status problem?Answer. Notwithstanding the fact that decision of International UN Court is of consultative character, it creates certain internationally legal precedent. It is crucially important to underline, that the court marked only the Declaration of proclamation of independence itself. However, on my opinion, this decision may be considered as an indirect recognition of Kosovo independence, what will push other states to its recognition.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
On July 20 the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Tskhovrebov K. I. played host for the Official Representative of Transdnuistrian Moldovan Republic in the Republic of South Ossetia Pukhaev A.I.
In the course of the meeting Pukhaev A.I. on behalf of the President, Parliament and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Transdnistrian Moldovan Republic paid respects to people and Government of the Republic of South Ossetia in connection with the July 18 fatal accident on the Transcaucasian highway. 
Tskhinval,
July, 20, 2010.

News_Titles: The Answer of RSO Minister of Foreign Affairs to IA «Res» Question Pertaining to US State Secretary Statement
News_Shorts: Question: Please comment the statement of US State secretary Hillary Clinton that “Washington will go on try for de-occupation of Georgian territories”.

News_Titles: Statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts:
In connection with the armed assault in Diseu village
On 15 of June 2010 Diseu village of Tskhinval district, the Republic of South Ossetia was fired from the police post in Koshki village, Georgia. As a result of this incident three fire-arms wounds received a citizen of South Ossetia Anatoly Kisiev, and his 15-year old son Robert Kisiev was detained and badly beaten, then released.

News_Titles: Joint Communiqué of Delegations of the Republic of Abkhazia and the Republic of South Ossetia at the International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia
News_Shorts:
Geneva, 8 June 2010
On 8 of June 2010 Geneva played host for the eleventh meeting within the framework of international discussions on security and stability in Transcaucasia. Discussions participating on equal grounds by delegations of the Republic of Abkhazia, Republic of South Ossetia, Georgia, Russia and US are held in accordance with Medvedev-Sarcozi agreements of the 12th of August and of the 8th of September 2008.

News_Titles: A reply of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia to IA “Res” Question Concerning the Act of Adoption of RSO State Independence on 29 of May 1992
News_Shorts: QUESTION: On 29 of May 1992 Supreme Soviet of the Republic of South Ossetia adopted an Act of RSO State Independence. What was the role of this Act in the case of achieving of independence?

News_Titles: Reply of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of RSO to IA “Res” on the Main Conclusions of the EU Commission Headed by Heidi Tagliavini on the Investigation of Circumstances of Armed Conflict in South Ossetia in August 2008
News_Shorts: Q. European Parliament supported the main conclusions of the report of the independent international EU commission headed by Heidi Tagliavini on the investigation of circumstances of armed conflict in South Ossetia, in line with it the war in South Ossetia was launched by Georgia. Do you think that Tagliavini’s conclusions will influence on the policy of the West support of current Georgian regime?

News_Titles: Greeting message of the Transnistrian Moldovan Republic Foreign Ministry
News_Shorts: The Transnistrian Moldovan Republic Minister of Foreign Affairs Vladimir Yastrebchak directed a greeting message to the Republic of South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev in connection with the celebration of the 65th anniversary of the Victory of the Soviet people in the Great Patriotic war. The message particularly says: “Keeping everlasting memory of the heroism and the valour of warriors defeated the fascism, this date unites people all over the post soviet area. This day we pay tribute to those who granted freedom and peace to us, who fought at the front and served on the home front, revived the country postwar.

News_Titles: Greeting Message of the Russian Federation Foreign Ministry
News_Shorts: The Russian Federation Minister of Foreign Affairs Sergei Lavrov directed a greeting message to the Republic of South Ossetia Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev in connection with the celebration of the 65th anniversary of the Victory of the Soviet people in the Great Patriotic war. The message particularly says: “Sincerely congratulate You and the personnel of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia with the momentous date of the common history of our peoples – 65th anniversary of the Victory in the Great Patriotic War”.

News_Titles: The Day of Memory and Grief
News_Shorts:
In connection with commemoration of the Day of the Memory and Grief in the Republic of South Ossetia on the 20th of May memorial events were held in Transdnistrian Moldovan Republic.
Taking part in the events were officials and the general public.
Press bureau
of RSO MFA

News_Titles: A Telegram of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of TMR
News_Shorts:
In view of the Day of national mourning on 20th of May the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Transdnistrian-Moldovan Republic Vladimir Yastrebchak directed a telegram to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev. It is told specifically in the telegram:
“A 20th of May 1992 will forever remain in the memory of people of South Ossetia as a day of terrible tragedy, an evidence of inhumanity of the effective Georgian regime.

News_Titles: The information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic Of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On the 13th of May was held the working meeting of the Plenipotentiary representative of the President of RSO on post conflict regulation Boris Chochiev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs Murat Dzhioev and the members of South Ossetian delegation of the Geneva Discussions for the security in Transcaucasia with the official delegation of the Geneva Discussions Co-Chairs.

News_Titles: An interview of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev to “Res” Information Agency
News_Shorts: Question: How can You comment ms Heidi Tagliavini’s statement at PAEU that it was Georgia who launched 2008 August war?

News_Titles: Information of RSO MFA
News_Shorts: On 23 of April a delegation of Transdnistria-Moldova Republic headed by the Foreign Minister of TMR Vladimir Yastrebchak paid an official visit to the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On 27 of April the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev plaid host to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Transdnistria-Moldova Republic Vladimir Yastrebchak who was on official visit to the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: A Note of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela on the occasion of 200 years of declaration of the Independence of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela
News_Shorts: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia presents its compliments to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela and has the honor to direct cordial congratulations on the occasion of 200 years of the Declaration of Independence of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.

News_Titles: Information of RSO MFA
News_Shorts: On 23 of April a delegation of Transdnistria-Moldova Republic headed by the Foreign Minister of TMR Vladimir Yastrebchak paid an official visit to the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: Information of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: On 27 of April the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Murat Djioev plaid host to the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Transdnistria-Moldova Republic Vladimir Yastrebchak who was on official visit to the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: A Note of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela on the occasion of 200 years of declaration of the Independence of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela
News_Shorts: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia presents its compliments to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela and has the honor to direct cordial congratulations on the occasion of 200 years of the Declaration of Independence of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.
